item.text: @#/ /mdo wa pa bzhugs so//
@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ sad d+harma rA dza mahA yA na sU tra/ bod
skad du/ dam pa'i chos kyi rgyal po theg pa chen po'i mdo/ /de'i tshe
na sangs rgyas shing sA la gnyis kyi bar na bzhugs te/ mya ngan
las 'das par gshegs kar sems can thams cad brgya
stong khri 'bum phal mang po kun shing gi drung na sangs rgyas
'khor bar bskor te 'khod nas mig ni/ yar bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du
blta ste| cung zad kyang mi g.yengs/ de nas yang dag par gshegs pas
'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'od chen po btang nas nam mkha'i khams thams cad
khyab par snang ste/ 'od de'i nang nas chos kun mngon par bstan nas de'i tshe
mang po'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' ming nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba zhig yod pa stan
las langs te sangs rgyas la lan gsum bskor nas slar ngos gcig tu 'dug ste lus smad
lnga sa la gtugs/ dus te mchi ma blags nas sangs rgyas la gsol pa/ lha'i nang na btsun
pa yang dag par gshegs pas mya ngan las 'das par gshegs pa'i dus kyang nye/ gshegs
su'ang sla na/ gshegs pa'i slad na rnyog pa rnam pa lnga'i sems can las ngan pa mang ba bgyid
cing ngan pa bcu sha stag spyod pa 'di lta bu'i sems can legs pa'i dpal gyi stobs snang ba
la sangs rgyas kyis shin tu zab cing / dam pa'i chos kyi yi ge sde bcu gnyis
bshad pa yi ge'i 'bru ni/ mang / gzhung ni/ rgya ches pas khong du chud cing 'tshal bar bgyi
ba'ang dka'/ chos 'di kun blta zhing rjes kyang mi chod na/ sangs rgyas kyis byams shing
thugs rjes gzigs te theg pa chen po'i chos yang dag pa'i bden pa bye brag phyed par bshad
de| sems can rnams yang dag pa'i sman bzang po thob par bgyis te nad gdug go cog
sos par bgyir smon to/ /sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la bka'
stsal pa| shin tu dge'o/ /shin tu dge'o/ /rigs kyi bu pho/ /khyod kyis sems can rnams kyi phyir 'di lta bu'i don chen po 'dri nus pa bsod nams chen po thob ste/
bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /ngas khyod la yang dag pa'i bden pa/ theg pa chen po'i chos bye brag phyed pa/ mi 'gyur ba'i gzhung rdzogs par bshad do/ /ci'i phyir zhes byas
na| sems can rgya cher thar par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /sems can rnams mya ngan dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir ro/ /sems can dmyal ba'i nyon mongs pa las phyin cing yul
gtsang mar skye bar bya ba'i phyir ro/ /yang dag par grol thar cing skye shi las 'das par bya ba'i phyir khyed rnams kun sems gcig tu soms shig dang khyed la go bar
bshad do/ /de nas phal mang po kun shin tu dga' gzha' ste/ kha tha dad kyis kyang tshig mthun par gcig car smras pa/ sangs rgyas kyis byams shing thugs rjes
gzigs te bdag cag rnams la bye brag phyed par bshad par smon to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhal nas rigs kyi bu pho rnams grol thar par 'dod na/ 'dod pa'i yan lag
bcad la sems gnyis su mi bsam par gcig tu bsam ste yod pa bsam pa'i sems btad ngo / /sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyi tshul ni/ stong pa ste/ sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyi
nang na 'go ba'ang med do/ gtang ba 'ang med do/ /blang ba dang gtang ba med na ci'ang thob pa med do/ /de'i ming ni/ byang chub bo/ /ji lta zhe na/ mya
ngan phal mang po kun ni/ sems gcig las skyes so/ /sems mi sems na mya ngan kyang mi skye ste/ 'du mched dang / shes rab rnams la blang ba dang gtang ba med do/ /blang
ba dang gtang ba med pa 'dod chags so cog dang bral lo/ /'dod chags so cog dang bral na 'dod pa'i yan lag med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis sangs
rgyas la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can kyi 'du mched dang / shes rab kyi legs nyes skye nus shing / lan bon ldang ba'i gnas lags te/ phyi nang mu gnyis kyi
chos so cog gcig gi nang du gcig zhugs nas ci'i slad nas de'i nang na blang ba dang btang ba ma mchis zhes bgyir rung / sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'
mdzod la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu pho/ /bsam gtan gcig tu 'dus pa'i nang du zhugs la kun gyis phyi nang du brtags na tha mar yong med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nang du
bltas| nang du brtags na yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid la skye ba med/ phyir bltas/ phyir brtags na/ ma rig pa mi ldang / skye ba'ang med/ ldang ba'ang med na/ mya ngan las
'das pa'ang med de/ de ni/ gtsang gdang ba yin no/ /de ni/ mchog tu dga' ba'i sman yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis sangs rgyas la gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'das/ yang dag par gshegs pas theg pa chen po'i chos yang dag pa'i gzugs shin tu zab cing gces pa/ bla na ma mchis pa'i sman bzang po dang / theg pa gcig gi bden
pa'i nang du 'jug pa bshad na/ slan chad kyi sems can mi gtsang ba'i las gsum gyis ngan pa bcu'i las bgyis te/ log sred kyi las spyad pas rtsa ba dang gzhi phra zhing zhan te/
sems la gzungs su gzung ba'ang dka' nas sman dang nad kyang gal te mi mthun na/ thabs ji ltar bgyis na theg pa chen po'i nang du 'jug par rung / sangs rgyas kyis byang
chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/ nga la thabs yod kyi/ theg pa chen po la 'jug par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis sangs rgyas
la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis gna' sngon thos pa yang dag par gshegs pas theg pa chen po'i mi la ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi chos bshad/ theg pa bar
ma'i mi la ni/ rgyu rkyen bcu gnyis kyi chos bshad/ theg pa chung ngu'i mi la ni/ bden pa bzhi'i chos bshad/ log sred kyi mi la ni/ dge ba bcu'i chos bshad de/ kun kyang nad kyi
gzugs dang sbyar nas chos kyi sman bzang po bshad na/ de ci'i slad nas thog pa gcig gi chos bshad de mi 'di rnam bzhi'i ra mda' bgyi/ sangs
rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/ ngas theg pa gcig gi lam gyi chos bshad pa 'di ni/ dper na/ sa gcig gis yod do cog
bskyed cing thams cad gso nus pa dang mtshungs so/ /yang dper na/ chos kyi char pa'i rlan gyis thams cad la khyab par yod ste/ sa las skyes so cog thams cad ngoms
so| |dper na/ 'bras sna gcig gi chan bro ba la 'jig rten gyi sems can mi dang mi ma yin pa kun za'o/ /zos so cog kun lus ni/ skye/ srog ni/ 'tsho ste/ kun skye bar
byas pa ni/ dper na/ sman gyi rgyal po sman sbyor mkhas pas sman gces pa bzang po kun sbyar te/ sems can tsha ba'i nad kyis btab pa la btang na ni/ grang bsil/ sems
can grang ba'i nad kyis btab pa la btang na ni/ dro tsha'o/ /tshad pa na ba la btang na ni/ tshad do/ /'khyil ba la btang na ni/ phol te/ nad mi sos pa med do/ /ngas theg pa gcig
bshad de/ mi de'i gzhi'i nad rnams gso ba'ang de dang mtshungs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis sangs rgyas la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ thabs ji lta
bu spyad de ngan pa bcu dang sems can log sred de theg pa gcig cig gi lam du 'jug par bgyi/ sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/ rigs
kyi bu pho| nga'i theg pa gcig gi chos la theg pa gsum ldan te/ yang gud na theg pa gsum zhes bya ba bshad pa med do/ /khyod brtag par nyon cig dang khyod la zhib tu bshad do/ /
rigs kyi bu pho/ dam pa'i chos kyi lam mo cog phyi mo'i gzhi ngo bo nyid gcig ste/ gnyis su med na thabs spyad pa'i phyir theg pa gsum du bshad do/ /theg pa gsum gyi chos
kun gcig tu 'dus par brtag /sems can no cog la rnam pa bzhi yod mod kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid la ni/ gnyis su med do/ /ji lta zhes byas na/ sangs rgyas so cog dang /
sems can no cog gi ngo bo nyid gcig tu mthun te/ mdo gcig ste tha dad pa med na/ sems can rang gi sems kyis bye brag dbye ba g.yos so/ /yod ni/ sangs rgyas kyang sems
can yin/ sems can kyang sangs rgyas yin te/ sems can no cog la'ang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid dang / sems can gyi ngo bo nyid de gnyis kyang
gcig ste/ ngo bo nyid gcig tu mtshungs mnyam mo/ /chos so cog dang yang mnyam pas na/ da la 'das yod pas theg pa gcig la zhugs par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu pho/ sems
can de rnams kyi sems kyi mkhar dam du srung du btsud de gzugs par bya'o/ /rnam par shes pa drug gi sgo mo chen po rdo rjes bsrungs bran la
sems 'dug pa'i gnas la brtags te sems 'dug pa'i gnas shes na/ sems 'dug pa'i gnas na sems mi 'dug go /sems mi 'dug na gdod sems 'dug pa med
do| |ngan no cog la sems mi 'dug cing / 'du mched khams la sems mi 'dug na/ 'dod pa'i yan lag gi sems med do/ /'dod pa'i yan lag med na/ sems kyis
'dod cing btsal ba med do/ /sems la btsal ba med na/ sems ga la'ang mi 'dug go /ga la'ang mi 'dug na/ gdod de'i ming ni/ sems 'dug ces bya'o/ /rigs
kyi bu pho| sems can gyis sems kyi mya ngan no cog byas pa ni/ kun kyang rnam par shes pa las g.yos te mi 'dug pas lan no/ /sems 'dug na 'dod mya ngan kyang med do/ /
mya ngan med na gdod byang chub yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis sangs rgyas la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can thams cad kyis mya ngan no cog
bgyis shing sems mi 'dug pa de ci zhig gi stobs kyis bslang ste 'dod pa'i yan lag bgyis pa/ sangs rgyas kyis byams shing thugs rjes gzigs te phal po la dgrol zhing
bshad par smon to/ /sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can no cog sems kyi yan lag g.yos pas rang bzhin gyi stobs gnyis yod do/ /gnyis zhes bya ba gang yin zhes
byas na| gcig ni/ 'du mched kyi phyir g.yos te sems kyi yan lag rang bzhin gyi stobs so/ /gnyis ni/ 'du mched kyi phyir ma langs kyi bdag gi sems la rang langs te/ de
ni| bdag gi rang bzhin gyi stobs so/ /rigs kyi bu pho/ de sems can rnams kyi rang bzhin gnyis mi g.yo bar byas na gdod mya ngan kyang med/ byang chub kyang med do/ /mya ngan kyang
med| byang chub kyang med na/ gdod yang dag par bden pa'i gnas su chud de/ de ni/ byang chub yang dag pa yin no/ /khyod la sogs pa byang chub sems dpas sems can zhig bstan
cing drang na'ang sems 'dug par ston cig /byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis sangs rgyas la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can bslab cing drang na de'i sems
'dug par bgyi na/ khams gang la 'dug na byang chub thob par rung / sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/ shin tu dge'o/ /shin tu
dge'o/ /rigs kyi bu lo/ khyod de 'dri re mkhas/ sems kyi phyi mo 'di lta bu 'dri ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin te/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /khyed brtag par
nyan cig dang / khyed la zhib tu bshad do/ /rigs kyi bu pho/ sems can bslabs shing drangs te sems 'dug par bya na/ 'dug pa ni/ nang
na'ang mi 'dug /phyi rol na'ang mi 'dug /bar ma na'ang mi 'dug go /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg pa chen po'i chos kyang nang na'ang mi 'dug /phyi rol na'ang mi 'dug /bar na'ang
mi 'dug go /sems kyi shes pa gcig pu la gnas te/ med pa'i gnas la 'dug pas na/ byang chub thob bo/ /byang chub thob tu zin kyang byang chub thob pa yong med de/ de'i
ming ni| yang dag pa'i mi g.yo ba zhes bya'o/ /ji lta zhes byas na/ mya ngan ni/ mi bden pa las skyes te/ mya ngan kyang stong pa'o/ /chos so cog kyang rang skyes pa med de/ chos
kyang stong pa'o/ /sems zhes bya ba'ang gyi na da ming yod du zad kyi thob par mi rung ste/ sems kyang stong pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu pho/ sems stong pa yin par rig na/ stong pa'i sems
gcig gis nang nas mi bden pa thams cad la blta ba'i mi rigs so/ /thams cad la bltas na/ de'i ming ni/ sems kyi dri ma zhes bya'o/ /sems la dri ma med na/ de'i
ming ni| zag pa zad ces bya ba ste/ mig dang kha dog dang sems gsum char yang stong pa ste/ rtag par gtsang ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis sangs rgyas
la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos so cog kun kyang de bzhin lags pa lta na/ sems can thams cad kyang lus gcig /sems gcig /khams gcig /sangs rgyas
gcig gi khams su chud par nus pa'i rigs/ sangs rgyas gcig gi khams nas stong pa gang zhig khyab pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi khams su 'jug nus pa'i rigs /
sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu pho/ khams thams cad kyang khams gcig tu gzhug tu rung ngo / /khams gcig dang /
pad+mo'i gdan gcig dang / yang dag par gshegs pa'i sku lus gcig gis khams thams cad kyang kun rgyas shing gang bar rung ngo / /khams thams cad mngon par bstan na/ kun kyang
stong pa'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi khams bzang du brgyan par yang rung ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' gcig gi lus kyi khams thams cad gang rgyas par rung ngo / /ba spu nyag ma gcig
gi bu ga'i nang du khams thams cad shong bar yang rung ngo / /khams thams cad khams gcig gi nang du gzhug pa dang / sems can gcig gi lus kyi nang du shong bar yang rung ngo / /
sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis gcig dang / byang chub kyi shing sdong po gcig gis khams thams cad gang yang rung ngo / /sgra skad snyan pa gcig gis khams thams cad gang ste/ thams
cad de bzhin thos shing shes te kun dga' gzha' bar yang rung ngo / /chos spyod pa rnams chos de bzhin gang bar shes na/ gzhan gyi yul khams
thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi lus btsal ba'i ma rigs kyi/ sems gcig dang / khams gcig gi gnas la sangs rgyas kyi lus btsal ba'i rigs so/ /lus gcig gi nang nas
thams cad kyi lus 'byung bar nus so/ /thams cad kyi lus kyi nang nas lus gcig 'byung bar nus so/ /ji lta zhes byas na/ lus gcig ni/ sangs rgyas gcig gi lus yin no/ /
lus mang po thams cad ni/ sems can gyi lus yin pas na/ kun sems gcig las skyes so/ /sems gcig bu dge na/ chos so cog zad par dge'o/ /sems gcig phyi
mo mi dge na/ chos so cog zad par yang mi dge'o/ /las ngan pa byas na/ sems can ngan pa'i lus su skye'o/ /las dge ba byas na/ lha dang mi'i lus su skye'o/ /sems gcig
po'ang sems gcig gi gzugs dang bral na/ sems kyi gzugs kyi nang na stong pa ste/ ci la'ang thob pa med do/ /stong pa'i khams dang yang bral na/ blang ba med pa'i sa ni/
sangs rgyas kyi lus skye nus so/ /sangs rgyas kyi lus la ni/ lus gcig tu zad kyi gnyis su med do/ /yong sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ gcig go /sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid gcig gi
nang na sems kyi ngo bo nyid gcig tu zad do/ /sems gcig po ma gtogs par gud du gzhan la btsal ba med do/ /gzhan la btsal ba byas na/ de ni/ yon po mi drang ba'o/ /ji lta
zhes byas na/ sems kyi chos thams cad ni/ phyi logs nas btsal ba med do/ /phyi logs kyi gnas nas btsal na/ de'i ming ni/ gzhan zhes bya'o/ /gzhan gyi gnas las
btsal na/ de ni/ mi bden pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis sangs rgyas la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems gcig gi nang nas sangs rgyas thob par rung
na| thams cad kyi sems kyi nang na kun la'ang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid mchis pa lta/ sems can thams cad kun la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid mchis na/ yang dag par gshegs pa
thams cad kyis sems gcig po spyad de/ sems can thams cad bskyed nus te sems gcig lus gcig gis 'khrug pa bsal na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos gzhan ma mchis te/ sangs rgyas kyi
chos kyi sku lus su skyes lags pa lta/ sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu pho/ de yin no/ /de yin no/ /khyod kyis bshad
ba bzhin te/ sems can kun la'ang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod de/ sangs rgyas yang dag par gshegs pa thams cad kun gyis sems gcig pu'i chos spyad de/ sems can
thams cad kyi sems so cog gcang sems gcig pu'i nang du sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol du btsud pas sangs rgyas kyi lus thob bo/ /byang chub sems
dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis sangs rgyas la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid mchis te/ sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyi nang du btsal
bas sangs rgyas thob na/ sems can thams cad kyi so so'i sems kyi nang na'ang sangs rgyas lags te/ de thob par yang rung / mthong bar yang rung lags pa lta/ sangs rgyas
kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu pho/ sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yang dag pa'i gzugs dam par 'jug pa ni/ thob ces byar yang
mi rung ngo / /mi thob ces byar yang mi rung ngo / /mthong zhes byar yang mi rung / mi mthong zhes byar yang mi rung ngo / /ji lta zhes byas na/ byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi ngo
bo nyid yod ces bshad na/ de'i ming ni/ sangs rgyas la skur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid med ces bshad na'ang sangs rgyas la skur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma
yin zhes bshad na'ang sangs rgyas la skur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid med ces bshad na'ang sangs rgyas la skur to/ /ji lta zhes byas na/ byang chub sems dpas sems
can gyi sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin na ni/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs/ med pa ma yin na ni/ ri bong gi rwa dang mtshungs te/ ri bong gi rwa ni/ yod med do/ /nam mkha' ni/ rtag par
yod do| |gzugs kyi tshul ni/ yod pa ma yin no/ /nam mkha'i tshul ni/ med pa ma yin no/ /gzugs kyi tshul kun dang bral na/ ci la'ang chags pa med do/ /skye ba'i gnas la mi
'dug ste/ de la skye bar mthong na dri ma'o/ /med pa'i gnas na mi 'dug ste/ de la ma mthong na chad pa zhes bya'o/ /sems can gyi sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyi dam pa'i gzugs ni/ de
lta bu yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod ces bshad na bskyed de skur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid med ces bshad na smad de skur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod kyang yod/ med
kyang med ces bshad na log par skur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa'ang ma yin/ med pa'ang ma yin zhes bshad na 'gran dor du skur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod
kyis sangs rgyas la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gyi sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid dam pa de bzhin du zab ste/ 'du mched kyi rnams dang bral bas cis kyang gos pa ma mchis te/
dper na/ /nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing phyi mo'i ngo bo nyid rtag par gtsang na/ /ci'i slad nas sems can gyis mya ngan rnams bgyis/ mya ngan bgyis na sems nyid dri ma lags pa lta na/
sems kyi dri ma de thog ma ga las skyes pa bcom ldan 'das kyis phal mang po la bshad de/ sems can rnams kun gyis thos shing shes par
bgyis te/ sems can rnams kyi mya ngan ngan no 'tshal ba zhig ste/ sems kyi dri ma bkrus bsal la bkab cing dkris pa yang bral bar smon to/ /de nas sangs rgyas 'dzum mul
zhes bzhad de phyag g.yon pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyi bo la phyis te 'od chen po btang nas thams cad kun tu khyab par byas so/ /de nas sems can phal mang po thams
cad kun shin tu dga' gzha'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhal nas byang chub sems dpas sems can rnams kyi phyir de lta bu'i dri ba byas pa de'i ming ni/ drang po dris pa ste/ sems can
thar par bya ba yin no/ /tshig gzhan dris na/ de'i ming ni/ yon por dris pa zhes bya ste/ sems can brlag pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyod drang po 'dri nus pa sems
can thar par byas pa yin no/ /khyed la sogs pa sems can kun sems gcig tu smos la brtag par nyan te/ 'gyes shing 'khrug pa'i sems sol la phyi logs kyi don
med par byos te sems kyi yid thub par 'dug cig dang khyod la bshad do/ /bshad pa thos na ngan pa bcu'i sems can kun grol thar pa thob bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'
mdzod kyis sangs rgyas la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag la sogs pa sems can phal mang po thams cad kun sems gcig tu bgyis lags te/ 'khrug pa'i sems
gzhan ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phal mang po la dgrol bshad par smon to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' dang / phal mang po rnams la bka' stsal
pa| mya ngan thams cad ni/ phyin ci log las skyes so/ /phyin ci log thams cad ni/ mi bden pa'i sems las skyes so/ /mi bden pa'i sems thams cad ni/ nga yod pa las
skyes so| |nga yod pa thams cad ni/ phyi mo yong med pa las skyes so/ /phyi mo med pa thams cad ni/ mi 'dug pa nyid yin no/ /phyi mo med na/ yod pa ma yin no/ /yod pa ni/ dri ma'o/ /
med pa ni/ gtsang ma'o/ /gtsang ma de'i gnas ni/ rtag par pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /skyid pa pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /nga pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /gtsang ma pha rol tu phyin pa
yin no| |de lta bu mthong ba ni/ ming drang po mthong ba zhes bya ste/ gzhan mthong ba ni/ ming yon po mthong ba zhes bya'o/ /de lta bu mthong ba ni/ mi de la shes rab yod do/ /gzhan
mthong ba ni/ mdo la shes rab med do/ /shes rab yod pas ni/ thabs kyis bkrol lo/ /shes rab med pas ni/ thabs kyis bcings so/ /byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod
kyis sangs rgyas la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gtsang ma'i gnas de na sems can la la zhig sems rtag tu rtag pa'i sems g.yos
so| |rtag tu skyid pa'i sems g.yo'o/ /rtag tu nga'i sems g.yo'o/ /rtag tu gtsang ma'i sems g.yo'o/ /shes rab yod pa lags te/ phyin ci log ma lags so/ /sangs rgyas
kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/ sems can la la zhig de ltar sems pa ni/ ming drang po sems pa ste/ mi de drang po mthong ba yin no/ /
mi de shes rab yod pa yin no/ /ji lta zhes byas na/ yang dag par gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku lus rtag pa pha rol tu phyin/ skyid pa pha rol tu phyin/ nga pha rol tu phyin/ gtsang ma pha
rol tu phyin te/ gtsang gdang bar gnas so/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi sku lus de lta bur mthong ba'i mi de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yang dag pa'i slob ma gcig pu yin te/ drang
po'i chos las skyes/ chos las 'phrul te skyes/ sangs rgyas kyi zhal nas skyes/ sangs rgyas kyi brtan pa bzhi thob bo/ /mi thal mal ba yin mod kyi/ brtan pa bzhi byang chub sems
dpa' yin no/ /rigs kyi bu pho/ nga 'das pa'i phyi na lo lnga brgya'ang rung / lo stong yang rung / lo stong lnga brgya'ang rung / de'i phyi na'ang mi la la zhig gis chos kyi yi ge 'di gzungs
su bzung ste kha ton dang klog nus la bshad pa bzhin du las su byas te rtag skyid gtsang gi gnas la med ches shing drang por mthong gi steng du chos 'di spyad de sems can bstan bslabs na/
sems can gcig bstan na de'i ming byang chub sems dpa'o/ /mi tha mal pa yin mod kyi yon phul ba blang du rung ste/ khyim nas byung ba'i mi yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' nam
mkha' mdzod kyis sangs rgyas la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ yong khyim nas byung ba'i mi de skra dang kha spu bregs la chos kyi gos gyon te tshul khrims tshang bar ma nos te tha mal
pa'i chos kyis ma gos pa de'i ming ni/ khyim nas byung ste/ yon blang du rung ba zhes bgyi na/ yang dag par gshegs pas de bshad pa mi tha mal pa la khyim nas byung ba'i mi lags
te| yon blang du rung zhes bgyi ba de'i gzhung bye brag ma phyed na/ sangs rgyas kyis byams shing thugs rjes gzigs te bdag la bshad par smon to/ /sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa'
nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu pho/ skra dang kha spu bregs pa ni/ lus la nga med par gdul ba'i phyir ro/ /chos kyi gos gyon pa ni/ tha mal pa'i chos dang dbral ba'i
phyir ro| |tshul khrims tshang bar 'dzin pa ni/ thob cing mi gzhig pa'i phyir ro/ /ngas bshad pa de mi tha mal pa yin mod kyi/ lus dang sems thul bar nus te/ nga dang le lo mi g.yo/ /
sems la rdul gyis ma gos te/ tha mal pa'i bral nas yun ring ste rdo rje dang mtshungs te/ tshul khrims kyi ngo bo nyid ma zhig pas tha mal pa
yin mod kyi/ yang dag par na khyim nas byung ba yang dag pa yin no/ /yang theg pa chen po'i chos kyi yi ge 'di'i nang na bshad pa bzhin du las su spyad na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la
yid ches pas rtag skyid nga gtsang mthong ste/ sems can la bkrol bshad na mi tha mal pa yin mod kyi/ brtan pa bzhi'i mi yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' las spyod pa yon blang
du rung ste/ ming ni/ dge bsnyen zhes bya'o/ /shes rab kyi thabs thob ste theg pa chen po'i chos bshad do/ /de lta bu'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid kun sems dang ma bral te/ sems las
'phrul skyes te/ ting nge 'dzin mi g.yo rtag par gcig pu'i sems la gnyis su med do/ /gcig pu'i sems kyi nang na phyi nang yang med/ bar ma'ang med de/ thams cad dang
bral lo| |thams cad dang bral na/ skye ba dang shi ba'ang med do/ /skye ba dang shi ba med na/ gdod yang dag pa'i mi g.yo ba yin no/ /yang dag pa'i mi g.yo ba rtag par 'dug la
sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun ni/ med par mi 'gyur ro/ /khams gsum gyi sems can ni/ rang skyes rang shi'o/ /rigs kyi bu pho/ ched kar sems can la nga med par bshad
do| |sangs rgyas dang yang dag par gshegs pa ni/ yang dag pa'i bden pa'i nga yin te/ skye shir 'bab pa las 'das so/ /khyod la sogs pa sems can rnams rtag par 'dug pa tshol na/
'dod pa'i rnams dang spongs la skye ba med pa'i las byos shig /byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis sangs rgyas la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ las ji lta bu spyad na/ ming skye
ba med pa'i las zhes bgyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhal nas rigs kyi bu pho rnams/ nga las gzhan ma skyes na/ gzhan las nga me skye'o/ /ji lta zhes byas na/ tshul gyi ngo bo nyid ni/ gtsang ma stong pa ste/
yod pa'ang ma yin/ rtag pa med pa'ang ma yin no/ /yod do cog kyang yong ni/ stong pa gtsang ma ste/ med pa'ang ma yin na mthar yang yod pa'ang ma yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa'
dang / sangs rgyas yang dag par gshegs pa rnams kyis 'khor mor ngo bo nyid gcig gi spos kyi ro bro bas sems can rnams kyi sems gcig gis ngo bo nyid gtsang mar bsangs
na| mdzangs pa rnams ni/ go ste stong par khong du chud/ blun po rnams kyis ni/ bslad pa'i nang du zhugs te chags bcings so/ /ji lta zhes byas na/ sems can shes rab yod pa
la gti mug med pas tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid yod de/ ma rig pa'i cig tshor ba med pa mi g.yo'o/ /stong pa'ang med/ mi 'gyur ba'ang med de/ gtsang gdang pa gcig pu'i nang du chud
nas mya ngan no cog dang yong bral lo/ /sems can blun po ni/ /gti mug yod pas tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid la ma tshor bas ma rig pa g.yos te tshor ba med

pas ni/ rdul dang mya ngan thams cad byas so/ /tshor ba yod par shes na/ tshor ba med pa'ang med do/ /tshor ba med pa'ang med na/ gdod nad kyang mi skye'o/ /nad mi skye na/ tshor ba yod pa'ang med do/ /tshor ba
yod pa med pa ni/ yid mi ches pa'i sems med do/ /ji lta zhes byas na/ yid mi ches pa'i sems gcig gi nang na yid rnam gnyis yod do/ /yid mi ches pa'i sems med na nad
kyang mi skye'o/ /skye ba'i gnas yod na ni/ khang pa stong par zhugs so/ /ngo bo nyid gcig gi yang dag pa'i stong ba ni/ bya ba ni/ yod/ gzugs ni/ med/ 'du mchad dang phrad do/ /
rgyu g.yos pa ni/ stong pa sgyu ma dang mtshungs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems can no cog yid mi ches pa'i sems ni/ chod par bya ba'i rigs so/ /bdag gis sems kyi mkhan po
bya bar smon to/ /sems kyis bdag gi mkhan po bya ba ni/ mi smon to/ /'dod pa'i rnams dang bral la rang nyams med par byas te/ bsam pa'i gnas skyes kyang bsal ba'i sems
med de| snga ma'i sems dang / phyi ma'i sems gcig la gcig 'gal bas na gzhung bzhin te/ ma rig pa mi g.yo/ tshor ba 'gyur ba yod mod kyi/ phyi mo mi g.yo bya'o/ /sems g.yos
pa'i tshe snga ma g.yos pa'i sems kyis dgag go /byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis sangs rgyas la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems kyi sngon logs na sems g.yos
pa mchis na chos ci bgyis pas tshor zhing dgag nus/ sangs rgyas kyi zhal nas byang chub sems dpas las spyod pa'i rnams las khor mor sems 'dug pa'i rnams la rtog tu bcug ste/
sems 'dug pa'i gnas rig na gdod sems mi 'dug go /de ltar tshor bas na tshor ba dgag go/ 'dod pa'i sems mi g.yon dgag cing brtag pa'ang med do/ /g.yo ba'i gnas yod
na stong pa la bde bar gzhag go /ngo bo nyid kyi stong pa gcig gi nang na gos pa dang gtsang ma gnyis ka'ang med do/ /ngo bo nyid gtsang gdang bas na/ blangs pa'ang med btang ba'ang med
do| |sems kyang mi skye'o/ /skye ba'ang med/ spyod pa'ang med/ lus kyis spyad pa'i gnas kyang med/ tshig smra ba'i lam yang chad/ sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyi dam pa tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid
ni| rtag par yod cing / dpe stong pa dang mtshungs te/ thams cad la ma chags so/ /byang chub sems dpas las 'di spyad na/ dper na/ dbyi gu thogs la nam mkha' la brdeg pa dang
mtshungs te/ phog ni/ phog ste/ chags pa med do/ /de'i ming chos spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /chags pa'i gnas yod du zin na phyi nang du zhugs pa yin no/ /sa gtsang mar bgrod cing 'gro na/ sems
gcig ste/ gnyis su ma med/ bsam gtan du zhugs la ldang dub kyi sems bkag ste/ yang dag pa'i bden pa gcig la brtags la 'gyod tshangs bya'o/ /de'i
tshe phal mang po'i nang na log sred ming 'dod mang zhes bya ba zhig yod pa gna' thog ma med pa tshun chad log pa mang du byas te/ nyes pa bcu rtag par byas nas ldang ba dang / khro ba dang /
phrag dog dang / 'gran nga ba dang 'di rnams bzhi'i sbrul gyis ni drangs/ mi bden pa dang phyi log gi sems kyi byi ba gnyis kyis ni/ sems kyi rtsa ba bcad de/ dper na/ mi zhig shing
gi kha na mar dpyangs la 'og na sbrul bzhi 'dug ste/ kha gdug pa'i rlangs pas ni/ gyen du bdugs/ shing gi kha nas byi ba gnyis kyis ni/ dpyang thag gi rtsa ba la zos te chad la thug/
sems gtsang ma gsum ni/ med par byas/ mig dang / kha dog dang / sems dang kun ni mi bden pa phyin ci log byed pa ste mthong bas bcings nas sems can dmyal bar lhung la thug
pa las skad cig bsam pa'i sems kyi nang na gnong bkur ba'i sems g.yos te/ yang dag par gshegs pa la 'gyod tshangs kyi chos 'dri'am snyam na yid la gnod zhing ngo tsha bas
'dri ma phod na/ yang dag par gshegs pa'i 'phrul gyi thugs kyis de'i yid la sems pa mkhyen te/ mi de sdug bsngal ba las bral te sems can dmyal ba'i sgo nas dbyung bar thugs
la dgongs nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/ nga 'das te song ba'i phyin log sred la la zhig gis las ngan pa mang du byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi dkon
mchog gsum med par byed pa de lta bu'i mi ni/ phyi ma'i dus la sems can dmyal ba'i nang du yang dag par lhung nas bskal pa chen po bcu gnyis kyi bar du'ang mi thar to/ /khyed byang chub
sems dpa' rnams kyis byams shing snying rje spyod la sems can 'di lta bu'i rnams 'gyod tshangs byed du chug la/ de'i sems kyi dri ma gtsang gdang bar byos la grol thar par byos shig /
byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis sangs rgyas la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'gyod tshangs kyi chos ci zhig bgyis na/ sdig bsal par rung ba sangs rgyas kyis byams
shing thugs rjes gzigs te bye brag phyed par bshad par smon to/ /sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/ 'gyod tshangs bya na yang dag pa'i bden
pa'i gzhung la brtag go/ /yang dag pa'i bden pa'i gzhung mthong na/ sdig gcig thams cad bsal to/ /sangs rgyas kyis tshig 'di skad bshad zin nas de'i tshe phal mang po brgya stong khri
'bum gyi sems can mi dang ma ma yin pa la sogs pa thams cad kun sems gcig tu yang dag ba'i bden gzhung gcig la brtags te/ mthong zin nas log sred 'dod mang mod
bzhin stan las langs te lus smad lnga sa la gtugs nas sangs rgyas la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi sems la ma rig pa
mchis pas brtag pa bslabs mod kyi/ yang dag pa'i bden pa'i gzhung ma mthong ngo / /thog ma zhes bgyi ba ma mchis pa tshun chad ngan pa bcu 'ba' zhig gis las bgyis na/ da
thabs ci spyad na/ bdag gis yang dag pa'i bden pa'i gzhung mthong zhing sdig zhu byang bar bgyir rung / sangs rgyas kyis 'dod mang la bka' stsal pa/ khyod la sogs pa log sred
can rnams kun sems gcig tu byos shig dang / ngas khyed la bye brag phyed par dgrol bshad do/ /'dod mang khyod la sogs pa sems can rnams kyis lus dang sems la sangs rgyas
kyi ngo bo gcig pu la brtags na chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyang rtag pa gcig pu'o/ /sangs rgyas so cog la'ang ngo bo nyid gcig pu ste/ gnyis su med pas na yang dag pa'i bden pa'i gzhung
yin no| |de la gnyis su yod par mthong na/ de'i ming ni/ yon po zhes bya'o/ /yon por lta na ni/ mya ngan 'khrug pa ldang ngo / /yon po mthong ba med na/ mya ngan 'khrug pa'ang mi
skye'o/ /mya ngan 'khrug pa chod na/ de'i ming gtsang gdang zhes bya'o/ /khyed la sogs pa sems can kun gyis sems gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid gcig pu la rtogs shig /sangs
rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid las gzhan mthong ba ni/ yong med do/ /gzhan mthong ba yod du zin na/ kun kyang sgyu ma mi bden pa yin no/ /mi bden pa de lta bu byed pa ni/ phyin ci log ces bya'o/ /'dod
mang sems gcig gtsang na ni/ chos so cog kun kyang gtsang ngo / /sems gcig sme na ni/ chos so cog kun kyang sme'o/ /sme ba'i dri ma ni/ sdig pa yin no/ /gtsang ma ni/ yang dag pa
yin no| |sems dri ma dang bral na/ sdig mi skye'o/ /'dod mang gis sangs rgyas la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis gna' nas las ngan pa rnams bgyis pa ni/ bskal pa stong
khri grangs ma mchis mu ma mchis pa lon na/ de ring sems bskyed do/ /yang dag pa'i bden pa'i gzhung gcig la brtags na/ mu ma mchis pa'i sdig kun byang ngam mi byang ba sangs rgyas kyis
dgrol bshad par smon to/ /sangs rgyas kyis 'dod mang la bka' stsal pa/ yang dag pa'i bden pa'i gzungs rtogs na/ sdig to cog kun ni/ byang ngo / /ci phyi nas shes byas na/ 'dod
mang / sngon chad ni/ dri ma'i sems so/ /da ni/ gtsang ma'i sems so/ /sems gcig ste gnyis su med de/ gud na sems gzhan med do/ /de ring gi sems gtsang na/ sngon gyi sems kyang
gtsang ngo / /de lta bas na/ bskal pa grangs med pa tshun chad kyi sdig rnams kun bang zhing med par mngon no/ /dper me long lo stong lon pa'i steng na rdul chags pa la gos kyis thang gcig
phyis na/ mi lang da'i med la bzhan snang ste/ dul kun phyis nas lhag ma'ang ma lus pa dang mtshungs so/ /yang gcig tu na khang pa mun nag lo stong lon
pa'i nang du mar me gcig bsregs pa dang mtshungs te/ mun pa kun med par song ngo / /khyed la sogs pa sems can gyi rnams rtag par sems gcig gis yang dag pa'i bden
pa'i gzhung gcig la brtag pa'i rigs so/ /chos so cog gi nang gi las rnams spyad de 'jig rten gyi chos so cog thams cad dang phral bar bya ba'i rigs so/ /ci'i phyir zhes byas na/
'dod mang / 'jig rten gyi chos ni/ g.yos kyang rung / ma g.yos kyang rung ste/ kun kyang mthar 'jig cing 'bral ba yin no/ /chos la zhig cing ral na spyod pa la'ang rtag pa med de/
chos la skye shi yod par 'gyur ro/ /skye shi yod pa'i chos dang bral na/ gdod ming yang dag pa'i gzhung zhes bya'o/ /'dod mang / dper na/ rdza mkhan gyis rdzas spyad byas pa dang mtshungs
te| yid la ci 'dod pa bzhin du byas na/ spyad la mi 'gyur ba med de/ spyad kyi dpe gzugs dang ming kun skyes shing dengs so/ /gyo mo'i rang bzhin 'ba' zhig yod de/ rang bzhin gcig
pu ni| rtag par yod do/ /dpe gzugs gzhan kun ni/ skyes shing dengs so/ /skyes shing dengs pa'i gzugs ni/ rang skyes pa ma yin no/ /rang skyes pa ma yin na/ yod pa ma yin no/ /
'dod mang / sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ dper gyo mo dang mtshungs so/ /sems gyi rang bzhin ni/ dper snod dang mtshungs te/ skye shi'i chos yin no/ /las so cog dang bral na/ sangs
rgyas kyi sku lus gcig yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi sku lus gcig la brtags na/ lus gzhan med do/ /'dod mang gis sangs rgyas la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis yang dag
pa'i gzhung la brtags pas sdig gi rnams kun byang lags na'ang las ci spyad na/ chos kyi lus skye bar rung / sangs rgyas kyis 'dod mang la bka' stsal pa/ yang dag pa'i bden pa'i
gzhung la brtags na/ nad do cog mi ldang ngo / /sdig dang dri ma kun ma g.yos na/ sems ni/ rdo rje dang mtshungs te/ nam du'ang mi 'jig go /tshul khrims gzung nus na/ sems nam mkha'
dang mtshungs te/ phyi nang gnyis ka gtsang gdang ngo / /bsam gtan 'dus pa'i nang du 'jug pa la mkhas na/ sems ni/ dper rlung dang me dang mtshungs te/ las ngan pa'o cog kun gyes
shing bsal to/ /shes rab la rten pa la mkhas na shes rab thob par rung ste/ de'i ming ni/ grol thar pa zhes bya'o/ /grol thar pas na yang dag pa shes shing mthong bar nus so/ /'dod mang /
khyod kyis 'di lta bu'i don sbyang zhing spyad nas na chos kyi sku las rnam pa lnga thob par rang ngo / /'dod mang gis sangs rgyas la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi sku lus rnam lnga la rgyu dang
'bras bu ci mchis/ sangs rgyas kyis 'dod mang la bka' stsal ba/ sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ rtag pa'i rgyu yin no/ /chos kyi sku lus ni/ rtag pa'i 'bras
bu yin no/ /ji lta zhes byas na/ sems kyi rgyu ni/ sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid de/ chos kyi yon gyis 'bras bu thob bo/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu dang bral na/ rgyu'i 'bras bu med do/ /rgyu dang
'bras bu med na/ sangs rgyas kyi lus yang dag pa yin no/ /'dod mang / sems gtsang ma'i yul la sems mi g.yo bar sangs rgyas tshe dpag med bsam na/ gdod yul gtsang
mar skye ste/ sems can gyi phyir mi g.yo ba'i chos bshad de/ sems yang dag pa'i stong pa'i nang du chud la g.yo zhing bshad pa'i rnams dang bral te/ shes pa gsum gyi ngo bo nyid
gcig ste/ rdo rje dang mtshungs par mi 'jig go /de'i tshe phal gyi nang na'ang byang chub sems dpa' ming spyod med ces bya ba zhig yod pa stan las langs te brag pa g.yas chos
bzhin byas/ pus mo g.yas pas la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas sangs rgyas la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas 'das te gshegs pa'i slad na lo lnga brgya'am/
lo stong ngam/ stong lnga brgya na sems can la chos bshad na/ chos gang bshad pa'i rigs pa sangs rgyas kyis byams shing thugs rjes gzigs te bdag la drang zhing bshad par smon
to| |sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyod med la bka' stsal ba/ rigs kyi bu pho/ /chos kyi rnams bshad pa ni/ mdo ni/ bshad/ gzugs ni/ mi bshad do/ /gzhung ni/
bshad| yi ge'i ri mo ni/ mi bshad do/ /de lta bur bshad pa ni/ chos yang dag pa yin no/ /yi ge'i ri mo dang / gzugs bshad na ni/ kha g.yos sems g.yos pa kun kyang bskur
cing / dbang zas pa'i rigs kyi bu pho sems can thams cad la chos bshad na mi g.yo ba bzhin du bshad/ mnyam snyoms par bshad pa'i rigs so/ /ji lta zhes byas na/ sems
can no cog gi sems gcig la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyang gcig ste/ ngo bo nyid gcig tu mnyam snyoms na/ chos so cog kun kyang mnyam snyoms so/ /de la mtho dman du bshad
na| de'i ming yon po bshad pa ste/ de'i kha ni/ ral/ de'i lce ni/ gas te/ ci'i phyir zhes byas na/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi dri ma'ang dri ma gcig tu mthun no/ /sems
can thams cad kyi sems gtsang ma'ang gtsang ma gcig tu mthun no/ /ci'i phyir zhes byas na/ sems can thams cad kyi sems gcig tu gtsang ste/ dge ba bcu'i chos mthun par
gtsang ngo / /sems can thams cad kyi sems gcig tu di ma yod na/ dan pa bcu'i chos gcig pa mthun par gis yod do/ /sems can gyi nad ni/ gcig tu mthun te/ sems can
gyi sman dgos na sman kyang gcig tu dgos so/ /chos mang du bshad na/ de'i ming ni/ phyin ci log ces bya'o/ /ci'i phyir zhes byas na/ mi bden pas bye
brag phye ste/ dge pa dang ngan pa'i chos bshig ste/ chos gcig bshig cing yid bzhin du chas bshad na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos lam bshad pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpas
chos bshad pa na mi g.yo ba bzhin du shod cig /byang chub sems dpa' spyod med kyis sangs rgyas la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar mi g.yo ba bzhin du bshad ces bgyi/
sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyod med la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu pho/ yang dag pa'i bden pa'i chos gcig bshad pa ni/ /mi g.yo ba bzhin du bshad pa yin no/ /
sems drang po rdzogs par bshad pa ni/ mi g.yo ba bzhin du bshad pa yin no/ /mu gcig la chags pa med par bshad pa ni/ mi g.yo ba bzhin du bshad pa yin no/ /bye brag dbye ba
med par bshad pa ni/ mi g.yo ba bzhin du bshad pa yin no/ /sems gcig tu gtsang mar gnas te bshad na/ mi g.yo ba bzhin du bshad pa yin no/ /bshad do cog kun bshad
du med na/ mi g.yo ba bzhin du bshad pa yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyod med kyis sems can pa la mang po thams cad kun gyis bye brag phyed par khong du chud par bya ba'i
phyir yang sangs rgyas la gsol pa/ ji lta bur bshad na bshad pa med de/ mi g.yo ba bzhin du bshad ces bgyi/ sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyod med la bka' stsal
pa| rigs kyi bu pho/ chos so cog gi rang bzhin gyi gzugs stong pa bas na/ dgrol shing bshad du med do/ /chos so cog la gzugs med pas na/ gzugs la dgrol bshad du med
de| bshad du mi rung ngo / /chos so cog la bya ba'ang med/ g.yo ba'ang med pas na/ bya ba med pa'i dgrol bshad pa la bshad du mi rung ngo / /rigs kyi bu pho/ dgrol bshad pa ni/
de ltar bshad de/ bshad pa de bshad du mi rung bas mi g.yo ba bzhin bshad ces bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyod med kyis sangs rgyas la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos
ni| de ltar bshad lags pa lta na/ ji lta bur na sems drang por rdzogs par bshad ces bgyi/ sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyod med la bka' stsal pa/ sems drang po
zhes bya ba ni/ sems drang po spyad de yang dag par gshegs pa'i gzhung yid ches par bshad pa la bdag gi sems bzhin mi bshad pa'o/ /rdzogs zhes bya ba ni/ dge ba bcu'i gzhung
tshogs pa dang / bden pa bzhi'i gzhung rdzogs pa dang / rgyu rkyen bcu gnyis kyi gzhag rdzogs pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi gzhung rdzogs pa dang / grol thar pa'i gzhung rdzogs pa yin
te/ de lta bu'i chos rnams rdzogs na/ da ni/ sems gcig gi na sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid gcig gi sar gtsang ma gcig snyoms par bshad na/ de'i
ming rdzogs par bshad de/ mi g.yo ba bzhin bshad ces bya'o/ /ci'i phyir zhes byas na/ chos so cog thams cad kun gcig tu rdzogs par bshad pa'i phyir ro/ /byang chub
sems dpas chos gcig tu gtsang mar snyoms/ dper mtsho chen po gcig gi chu'i nang na nor bu rin po che rnam pa mang du yod pa la tshol bas yid bzhin du rnyed pa dang mtshungs
so| |yang dper na/ 'phrul gyi sman tan zhes bya ba sman go bdun rnam pa mang po las sbyar te/ nad do cog gsos na sman btang ba bzhin du kun sos so/ /snying gtsang ma gcig tu snyoms
na sems gcig tu gtsang / sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid gcig tu gtsang / chos kyi rnams gcig tu gtsang ste/ mnyam snyoms na chos kyi rnams snyoms te/ de lta bur bshad pa ni/ gtsang
mar bshad pa yin no/ /gzhan ltar bshad pa ni/ sme bar bshad pa yin no/ /ci'i phyir zhes byas na/ sems can thams cad kun la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod do/ /sangs rgyas
kyi ngo bo nyid med pa med de/ tshor ba la nye ring yod du zad do/ /rtsa ba'i phyi mo bzhin du theg pa chung ngu'i mi la ni/ theg pa chung ngu'i chos bshad/ log sred kyi mi la ni/ log sred kyi
chos bshad na/ de'i ming ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos lam yon por bshad pa zhes bya ste/ sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid chad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku lus med par 'chad pa'o/ /de lta bur chos
'chad pa'i mi ni/ bskal pa brgya stong khri'i bar du sems can dmyal ba rnams su lhung ste/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung du zin kyang mi thar te/ /thar du zin te mi'i nang du skyes na'ang yul gyi
mtha' 'khob mi'i tha ma'i nang du skyes te/ mchu sho re la lce med pa de lta bu'i lus thob bo/ /ci'i phyir zhes byas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi ngo bo nyid ni/ chos kyi ngo bo nyid
yin te| chos kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ rtag par gtsang la yang dag pa'i mtshan bzang po rnam pa kun ldan te/ phyi mo nas thob pa'ang med/ stong pa'ang med de/ byung ba'ang med/ nub pa'ang
med de| ngo bo nyid rtag cing yang dag pa'i bden pa ste/ sgyu ma mi bden pa'ang med do/ /mya ngan 'khrug pa'ang med do/ /mya ngan las 'das pa'ang med do/ /skyed bri'ang med la mtha'
yun du gtsang gdang ste/ ngo bo nyid gcig tu gtsang gdang ba ni/ byang chub nyid yin no/ /gtsang gdang ba'i ngo bo nyid dang / byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ gcig tu zad de/ gnyis su
med do| |gtsang gdang ba'i btang snyoms pa ste/ yi ge'i 'bru dang / tshig gi lam yang chad do/ /dper na/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs te/ phyi nang gnyis ka gtsang gdang ngo / /gtsang
gding pa gcig po de ni/ phyi nang na'ang ma gnas/ par na'ang ma nas/ smra ba'ang med/ bshad pa'ang med do/ /ji lta bur na de'i nang nas nad kyi
rtsi bye brag dbye/ bye brag dbye ba med na bye brag dbye ba'i shes rab yin no/ /rigs kyi bu pho/ sems gcig dang / gtsang gdang ba gcig dang / sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid gcig
dang / 'di rnams dang bral na sangs rgyas btsal du'ang med/ chos bshad du'ang med/ dge 'dun thob pa'ang med do/ /ji lta zhes byas na/ sangs rgyas ni/ chos yin no/ /chos
ni| dge 'dun yin no/ /de lta bas na/ ngas chos kyi yi ge 'di bshad pa sems can gyi lus gcig /sems gcig /gtsang gdang ba gcig /sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid gcig /
sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sa gcig /byang chub kyi sdong po gcig gis khams so cog thams cad gang rgyas te sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi nang du chud do/ /rigs kyi bu pho/ sangs rgyas
thams cad ni/ chos kyi yi ge 'di las skyes so/ /chos so cog kun ni/ chos kyi yi ge 'di las byung ngo / /dge 'dun thams cad kyang chos kyi yi ge 'di las snang ngo / /chos kyi
yi ge 'di mnos shing gzungs su 'dzin pa ni/ ming dkon mchog gsum gzungs su 'dzin pa zhes bya'o/ /chos kyi yi ge 'di klog cing 'di'i gzhung rgya cher klog tu bcug na/ la
la zhig na ba yod na'ang kun sos te/ 'dre gdon dang ngan pa'i rnams nye nus pa med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyod kyis sems can la phan bsod de lta bu yod kyi/ ngas chos kyi
yi ge 'di khyod la gtams te gtad la/ gcig tu na sems can la ra mda' bya zhing bsgral ba'i chos nyung du thos la mang du shes pa dang / nyung du mthong ba la mang du rig pa dang / yi
ge'i ri mo mang du ma btsal bar gzhung gi mngon rtags thob pa'ang bshad kyi/ khyed la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kun sems gcig tu brtag par nyon cig dang khyod
la dgrol bshad do/ /sems can thams cad kun sems gcig /sangs rgyas gcig /ngo bo nyid gcig ste/ mya ngan 'khrug pa thams cad kun ni/ sems gcig las skyes so/ /
kun kyang 'du mched dang / shes rab gnyis kyi gnas kyi rgyu las langs so/ /ji lta zhes byas na/ rgyu'i rang bzhin dang / bdag gi rang bzhin dang / rang bzhin gnyis kyi stobs las
stobs rnams gnyis kyi rang bzhin g.yos te/ skad cig bsam pa las mi bden pa'i sems skyes te/ mi bden pa de la ni/ phyi mo'ang med do/ /skad cig sems g.yos pa'i tshe
mya ngan 'khrag pa'ang mod bzhin ldang ngo / /sems 'di la brtags na mi byed ba'i sems la mi mo med do/ /phyi mo med na gnas kyang med do/ /de la gnas med par rtogs na tshor
pa'i sems skyes te/ phyi ma char ba'i sems gtsang ma la bsam pa yang med do/ /sems la bsam pa med na/ sems mi g.yo'o/ /sems
mi g.yo na/ sems kyi gnas kyang med de/ de'i ming ni/ gtsang gdang ngo / /gtsang gdang ba'i stong pa'i sems ni/ ngo bo nyid phyi mo nas gtsang gdang ste/ gtsang mas mngon
brtags par yang med do/ /gtsang gdang ba'i sems dang yang bral bas na/ gtsang gdang zhes bshad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni/ gtsang gdang pa'i sems la bya
ba'ang med/ g.yo ba'ang med/ dri ma'ang med/ gtsang ma'ang med/ skye ba'ang med/ 'bri ba'ang med de/ mthar cis kyang gos pa med de/ gnas gcig la'ang 'dug pa
med de| de'i ming dang grangs las yong bral lo/ /rtag pa de bzhin na/ de bzhin zhes bya ba'ang med de/ dper rdo rje dang mtshungs te/ ngo bo nyid gcig pu la zhig pa'ang med do/ /dper
nam mkha' dang mtshungs te/ thams cad shong / dper me tog pad+mo dang mtshungs te/ sred pa'i chus mi chags so/ /las 'di spyad na yang dag par grol thar te skye shi 'bab las 'das
te| sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal las phyin to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems gcig gi chos 'di ming gcig ni/ 'gyod tshangs kyis grol thar pa zhes kyang bya ste/ yang dag
ba'i bden pa'i gzhung mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /gnyis su na ming chos spyad pas grol thar ces kyang bya ste/ nags gcig na 'dug pa'i phyir ro/ /gsum du na ming spyad pa med pas grol thar ces
kyang bya ste/ 'dug cing chags pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /grol thar pa 'di gsum ni/ kun kyang sems gcig las skyes te/ sems can thams cad la sems gnyis su med pa'i phyir ro/ /
sems can thams cad kun la theg pa gcig pu yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi rgyal po chos gcig shes par nus na/ chos gcig mi shes pa med do/ /chos gcig mi shes na/
chos gcig kyang shes pa med do/ /ji lta zhes byas na/ chos kyi rnams mi gcig pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di gcig pu thos na/ de ni/ nyung du thos pa yin no/ /chos mi shes
pa med pa de'i ming ni/ mang du shes pa'o/ /ci'i phyir zhes byas na/ chos so cog gi ngo bo nyid gtsang ma gcig la 'dus pa'i phyir ro/ /gcig pu 'di mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /gcig pu 'di
mthong na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lus mthong ngo / /ci'i phyir zhes byas na/ sangs rgyas so cog gi lus ni/ gtsang ma gcig las byung ba'i phyir ro/ /gtsang ma gcig gis ni/ sangs rgyas
gcig gi las dang / sangs rgyas kyis gcig dang / byang chub kyi sdong po gcig yin no/ /rigs kyi bu phro/ chos 'di'i nang nas mya ngan 'khrug pa'i rnams bcad pa ni/ dper sdong po bcad pa dang
mtshungs/ rtsa ba 'ba' zhig bcad kyi yal ga dang 'dab ma mi gcod do/ /ci'i phyir zhes byas na/ dper mi la la zhig lus la dug mdas phog ste /
lus na tsha ba la mda' phyung na ni/ nad kyang sos so/ /mda' ma phyung na ni/ nad kyang mi sos so/ /de la bsdad de mda' de'i sgro ni/ ci'i sgro/ gcig tu na de'i smyug ri gang las
byung / mda' de sus 'phangs zhes 'dri na/ de'i bar du mi de na tsha bas tshe srog zad zin to/ /de'i 'og tu mda' phyung ba ni/ phan pa med par mngon no/ /rigs kyi bu pho/ sems
mod bzhin du khrus shig /sems gtsang mar 'dug na/ de'i ming ni/ gtsang gdang zhes bya'o/ /'du mched kyi rnams gtsang gdang na|yod pa la chags pa'i rnams dang bral
te| chags pa med pa'i nang du chud par nus so/ /ci'i phyir zhes byas na/ phyi mo sems can la bslabs te sman bzang po 'di bshad de nad kyi rnams gsos la kun sos par 'tshal
lo| |yang gcig tu na chos kyi yi ge 'di'i rdo rje'i shes rab kyi ral gris sems can rnams kyi ma rig pa'i yid breg go /yang gcig tu na chos kyi yi ge 'di gtsang gdang ba'i
chos spyad de/ sems can rnams kyi gdug pa gsum gyi dri ma brdab cing bsal lo/ /yang gcig tu na chos kyi yi ge 'di shes rab kyi stobs po che spyad de/ sems can dkris pa
bcus bcings pa grol thar par 'tshal lo/ /yang gcig tu na chos kyi yi ge 'di ngo bo nyid gtsang gdang bar gcig tu spyad de/ sems can gyi rnams kun gyi lus gcig /sems
gcig /sangs rgyas gcig /ngo bo nyid gcig /gtsang gdang pa gcig thob ste/ theg pa tshigs kyi nang du chud yang dag par 'tshal lo/ /sems sems can dmyal ba nas thar yang
dag par 'tshal lo/ /sems can dmyal ba nas thar yang dag par 'tshal lo/ /bdag gi sems can gyi rnams bsgral ba'i ra mda' nus te/ sems can gyi rnams sems can
dmyal ba rnams su ltung na bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi sku lus nub cing med par bgyis lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di bdag la gtad cing gdams par
smon to| |bdag la'ang sems can rgya cher sgrol ba bshad de sems can gyi rnams thos pa nyung la shes pa mang / mthong ba nyung la rig pa mang / yi ge'i ri mo mang du ma 'tshal par
gzhung gi mngon rtags thob ste/ chos nyung dus yang dag par grol thar la/ gzhan dogs pa 'dri ba ma mchis par bgyi na/ sangs rgyas kyis byams shing thugs rjes gzigs te bdag
la dgrol bshad par smon to/ /sangs rgyas kyis phal mang po la bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po 'dis bskal pa brgya stong khri 'bum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la yon
gsol myong zin pas na/ thabs spyod pa mkhas te sems can la ra mda' bya zhing bsgral nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'dis ro bro ba'i rlung
spyad de sems can rnams kyi srog mthud nus so/ /khyed la sogs pa da lta'i dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi sems can rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'di'i ming gzungs su
bzung gi steng du dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po gyis/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong par grol thar pa thogs pa med pa thob bo/ /de nas byang
chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal pos sa la gtugs te phyag btsal nas langs te de'i gzhi nas mya ngan las 'das pa chen por zhugs na stong pas grol thar pa go ste/
chags pa med pa'i sa las rkang pa bteg pa dang / rkang pa bor ba kun kyang gtsang gdang ba bsgrod de/ thal mo sbyar nas sangs rgyas la phyag btsal te song ngo / /dam pa'i chos kyi
rgyal po'i yi ge bam po gcig ste/ rdzogs so// //sngon rgya las 'gyur ba'i yig rnying skad gsar gyis ma bcos par snang / rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya d+harma Na ya nA ma ma hA
yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa chos kyi tshul zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis
thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na smyig ma las byas pa'i 'khor gyi khyams na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe smyig ma las byas pa'i 'khor gyi khyams
su 'dus shing 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rab tu mang po dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gis ji ltar gnas par bya/ ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ ji ltar rnal 'byor du bya/ ji ltar
sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rab tu mang po de dag gi bsam pa mkhyen nas smyig ma las byas pa'i 'khor gyi
khyams ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas gdan bting ba la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rab tu mang po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
to| |rigs kyi bu dag /legs so legs so/ /khyod kyi rtog pa ni/ bzang ngo / /yid kyi dri ba ni/ mdzes so/ /spobs pa ni/ dge'o/ /yid la bya ba ni/ tshul bzhin no/ /rigs kyi bu
dag /de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshul gang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad ston par
byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad brjod par byed pa de lta bu'i chos kyi tshul ngas khyod la bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ legs so/ /zhes gsol nas byang chub sems dpa'
de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/
mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsam pa can du gyis shig /'khor bar sbyor ba can du gyis shig /'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang gnas par ma byed cig /de dag gis gsol
pa| bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsam pa can dang / 'khor bar sbyor ba can lags/ ji ltar na/ 'khor ba
dang | mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang mi gnas pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chi ba med pa'i bde ba la reg par bya ba'i phyir mya ngan las 'das
pa'i bsam pa can yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i phyir 'khor bar sbyor ba can yin/ 'phags pa dang so so'i skye bo dag bstan pa'i phyir 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das
pa la'ang mi gnas te/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ rang gi sems yongs su sbyongs shig /pha rol gyi sems srungs shig /sems dpa' ba can du gyis
shig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rang gi sems yongs su sbyong bar bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na/ gzhan gyi sems srung ba
lags| ji ltar na/ sems dpa' ba can lags/ bka' stsal pa/ nyon mongs pa sel bas rang gi sems yongs su sbyong bar byed pa yin/ khong khro ba med pas gzhan gyi sems srung
ba yin/ byang chub kyi sems mi gtong bas sems dpa' ba yin te/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ bya ba dang yang 'gal bar ma byed cig /bya ba ma yin pa
la'ang snang bar gyis shig /byas pa la lan re ba med par gyis shig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bgyi ba dang mi 'gal bar bgyid
pa lags/ ji ltar na/ mi bgyi ba la'ang gda' ba lags/ ji ltar na/ bgyi ba la lan re ba ma mchis pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ bya ba dang 'gal bar mi bya ba ba ni/ rten cing
'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos la 'jug pas las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches par bya'o/ /bya ba ma yin pa la snang ba ni/ snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'o/ /byas pa la lan
re ba med pa ni/ lan du phan 'dogs pa re ba med pa ste/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ dus ma yin par ni/ ma ldang zhig /dus la bab na ni/ ma nyal cig
nyal ba rnams ni/ slongs shig /rtag tu ni/ nyal cig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus ma lags par mi ldang ba lags/ ji
ltar na| dus la bab na mi nyal ba lags/ ji ltar na/ nyal ba rnams slong ba lags/ ji ltar na/ rtag tu nyal ba lags/ bka' stsal pa/
dus ma yin par mi ldang ba ni/ snod du ma gyur ba rnams la chos mi bstan pa'o/ /dus la bab na mi nyal ba ni/ snod du gyur pa las 'da' bar mi bya'o/ /nyal ba rnams bslang ba ni/
dus dang dus ma yin pas bskul ba'o/ /rtag tu nyal ba ni/ snyoms par 'jug pa las mi ldang ba ste/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ yid brtan pa med par
gyis shig/ yid brtan pa gzhig par gyis shig /yid ma brtan pa rnams la yid brtan par gyis shig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
yid mi rton pa lags/ ji ltar na/ yid brtan pa 'jig par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na/ yid ma brtan pa rnams la yid rton pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ yid mi brtan
zhes bya ba ni/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yid mi bzhag pa'o/ /yid brtan pa zhig par bya ba ni/ snyoms par 'jug pa bzlog pa'o/ /yid ma brtan pa
rnams la yid brtan par bya ba ni/ log par zhugs pa rnams la ste/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ nor dang ldan par gyis shig /byas pa shes pa med par
sbyor cig /ci la'ang lan re bar ma byed cig /rnyed pa chen pos nye bar 'tsho bar gyis shig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams nor dang ldan
pa lags/ ji ltar na/ byas pa 'tshal ba ma mchis par sbyor ba lags/ ji ltar na/ ci la'ang lan mi re ba lags/ ji ltar na/ rnyed pa chen pos nye bar 'tsho ba lags/ bka'
stsal pa| nor dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ nor bdun dang ldan pa'o/ /byas pa shes pa med par sbyar ba ni/ ser sna can rnams sbyin pa la sbyar ba dang / shes rab 'chal pa rnams shes
rab la sbyar ba'o/ /ci la'ang lan re ba med pa ni/ rang gi dgos pa la'ang nan tan du bya ba'o/ /rnyed pa chen pos nye bar 'tsho ba ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs
su bsngo ba ste/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ chags pa'ang shes par gyis shig /chags pa rnams la'ang spyod cig /chags pa la zhen pa rnams la'ang ltos
shig /chags pa med pa la'ang srungs shig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chags pa 'tshal ba lags/ ji ltar na/ chags
pa rnams la spyod pa lags/ ji ltar na/ chags par zhen pa la lta ba lags/ ji ltar na/ chags pa ma mchis pa srung ba lags/ bka' stsal pa/ chags pa shes par bya ba
ni/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /chags rnams la spyad pa ni/ skye mched drug bcad pa'o/ /chags par zhen pa la lta ba ni/
so so'i skye bo yongs su smin par bya'o/ /chags pa med pa srung ba ni/ skyon med par mi 'jug pa ste/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ 'jigs par gyis shig/
mngon par dga' ba med par gyis shig/ snying brtse ba med par gyis shig /snying rje ba med par gyis shig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'
rnams 'jigs par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na/ mngon par dga' ba ma mchis pa lags/ ji ltar na/ snying brtse ba ma mchis pa lags/ ji ltar na/ snying rje ba ma mchis
pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jigs zhes bya ba ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sas 'jigs pa'o/ /mngon par dga' ba med ces bya ba ni/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms
par 'jug pa rnams la dga' ba med pa'o/ /snying brtse ba med pa ni/ phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams yongs su btang ba la'o/ /snying rje ba med pa ni/ nang gi dngos po mgo la sogs pa
yongs su btang ba la ste/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag/ de lta bas na/ bden pa'ang khong du chud par gyis shig /brdzun du smra ba'ang ma spongs shig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das| ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bden pa khong du chud par bgyi ba lags/ ji ltar na/ brdzun du smra ba ni/ mi spong ba lags/ bka' stsal pa/ bden pa
khong du chud par bya ba ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas 'dul ba'i phyir ro/ /brdzun du smra ba mi spong ba ni/ 'dus byas la nye bar spyod pa'i phyir te/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu
dag /de lta bas na/ pha rol tu phyin par bgyis te/ tshu rol gyi ngogs la blta bar gyis shig /pha rol tu phyin par ma byed par pha rol gyi ngogs la blta bar gyis shig /gsol pa /
bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin cing tshu rol gyi ngogs la blta ba lags/ ji ltar na/ pha rol tu phyin par mi bgyid cing pha rol gyi ngogs la
blta ba lags/ bka' stsal pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa dang / bsam pa la'o/ /tshu rol gyi ngogs la lta ba ni/ sems can thams
cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /pha rol tu phyin par mi bya ba ni/ pha rol rgal ba'i phyir ro/ /pha rol gyi ngogs la lta ba ni/ rtag tu mya ngan las 'da' ba la gzhol bar bya ste/
de ni| tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ rtag tu ni mthun par yang gyis la rtsod pa med pa mchog tu'ang gyis shig /byams pa la'ang gnas la skyon yang mthong bar gyis shig
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rtag tu mi mthun par bgyid pa dang / rtsod pa ma mchis pa mchog tu
bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na/ byams pa la gnas shing skyon yang mthong ba lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rtag tu mi mthun par byed pa ni/ dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir
ro| |rtsod pa med pa mchog tu byed pa ni/ bsam pa dag pa'i phyir ro/ /byams pa la gnas pa ni/ sems can yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir ro/ /nyes pa mthong ba ni/ 'dus byas
kyi dngos po thams cad de/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ zad pa'ang zad par ma byed cig /mi zad par yang ltung bar ma byed cig/ zad pa'i chos nyid kyang khong
du chud par gyis shig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams zad pa zad par mi bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na/ mi zad par mi ltung ba lags
ji ltar na/ zad pa'i chos nyid kyang khong du chud pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ zad pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'dus byas so/ /mi zad pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'dus ma byas so/ /de la byang
chub sems dpas dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i phyir 'dus byas kyang zad par mi bya'o/ /thabs la mkhas pas 'dus ma byas su'ang ltung bar mi bya'o/ /zad pa'i chos nyid khong du chud par
bya ba ni| mi rtag pa'i mthar 'gyur ba ste/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ mun pa'i nang na'ang gnas par gyis shig /snang ba'ang zin par gyis shig /mi bya ba ni/ gyis
shig /bya ba ni/ yal bar zhog cig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mun pa'i nang na gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na/ snang ba zin pa lags/
ji ltar na/ mi bgyi ba bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na/ bgyi ba yal bar gzhog pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ mun pa zhes bya ba ni/ mi shes pa ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams
kyis sems can mi shes pa rnams kyi don du bden pa thob par bya'o/ /snang ba zhes bya ba ni/ shes rab ste/ shes rab des kyang mun pa bsal bar bya'o/ /mi bya ba zhes bya ba ni/ mya ngan
las 'das pa'o/ /bya ba zhes bya ba ni/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'o/ /de byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yal bar gzhag par bya ste/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta
bas na| zab mo'i chos kyi snang ba la'ang gnas par gyis shig /snang ba'i chos rnams la'ang brnyas par ma byed cig /snang ba dang mi snang ba la'ang ma gnas shig /gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams zab mo'i chos kyi snang ba la gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na/ snang bar gyur pa'i chos rnams la brnyas pa ma mchis pa lags/ ji
ltar na/ snang ba dang mi snang ba la mi gnas la lags/ bka' stsal pa/ zab ces bya ba ni/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste/ de la byang chub
sems dpa' rnams kyis lta ba thams cad dang bral bas chos thams cad rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin par rig par bya'o/ /chos gang dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung
bas snang bar gyur pa de dag la'ang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir brnyas par mi bya'o/ /snang ba dang mi snang ba la gnas par mi bya ba ni/ gnyis dang bral ba'i
phyir te| de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ gang yang dag par bsdu bar bya ba de la 'dod pa med par gyis shig /yang dag par bsdu ba'i phyir yang brtson
'grus ma glod cig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams gang yang dag par bsdu bar bgyi ba de la 'dod pa ma mchis pa lags/
ji ltar na/ yang dag par bsdu bar bgyi ba'i slad du brtson 'grus lhod par mi bgyid pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ yang dag par bsdu ba zhes bya ba ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams
so| |de la 'dod pa med pa ni/ mi lta bar sems can rnams la btang ba'o/ /yang dag par bsdu ba la brtson 'grus ma slong bar dge ba'i rtsa ba la ngoms mi shes par brtson
par bya ba ste/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ gting dpag dka' bar yang gyis shig /spyod pa gsal ba la'ang snang bar gyis shig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji
ltar na| byang chub sems dpa' rnams gting dpag dka' ba lags/ ji ltar na/ spyod pa gsal ba la'ang gda' ba lags/ bka' stsal pa/ gting dpag dka' ba zhes bya ba ni/
zab pa la snyoms par 'jug pa ste/ gang la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gting mi rnyed pa'o/ /spyod pa gsal ba la'ang snang bar zhes bya ba ni/ byis pa so so'i skye bo'i
chos rnams dang 'dre bar bya ba ste/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ lam las gzur bar gyis shig /lam gol ba na'ang snang bar gyis shig /yang dag pa'i
lam yang ma dor cig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ma las 'dzur ba lags/ ji ltar na/ lam gol ba na'ang gda' ba lags
ji ltar na/ yang dag pa'i lam mi 'dor ba lags/ bka' stsal pa/ lam las 'dzur ba zhes bya ba ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi lam las 'byol ba'o/ /lam gol
ba na snang ba ni/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /yang dag pa'i lam mi 'dor ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi lam ste/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu
dag/ de lta bas na/ phyir mi ldog pa'i go cha'ang bgo bar gyis shig /thams cad las kyang phyir ldog par gyis shig /phyir log nas kyang sgrol cig /
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams phyir mi ldog pa'i go cha bgos pa lags/ ji ltar na/ thams cad las phyir ldog pa lags/ ji ltar
na| phyir log nas sgrol ba lags/ bka' stsal pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i go cha bgos zhes bya ba ni/ chos dang mthun pa'i dam bcas pa la gnas pa'o/ /thams cad las phyir
ldog pa ni/ chos dang mi ldan pa'i dam bcas pa las ldog pa'o/ /phyir log pa nas sgrol pa ni/ mi dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi ste/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ 'dum
par gyis shig /rtag tu dbye bar gyis shig /brtan par gyis shig /blo rgod cing mi rgod par yang gyis shig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dum
pa lags/ ji ltar na/ rtag tu dbye ba lags/ ji ltar na/ brtan pa lags/ ji ltar na/ blo rgod cing mi rgod pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'dum zhes bya ba ni/ bdud zil gyis
mnan pa'i phyir ro/ /rtag tu dbye ba ni/ gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mi gnas pa'i sems gzhan dang gzhan shes pa'o/ /brtan pa ni/ sgrub pa la'o/ /blo rgod cing mi rgod pa ni/ dge
ba'i chos gzhan dang gzhan la dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ rjes su chags par yang gyis shig /rtag tu zhe 'gras par yang gyis shig /
yun ring por lta bar yang gyis shig /byas pa mi gzo bar yang gyis shig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rjes su chags pa lags/ ji
ltar na| rtag tu zhe 'gras pa lags/ ji ltar na/ yun ring por lta ba lags/ ji ltar na/ byas pa mi gzo ba lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rjes su chags pa zhes bya ba ni/ theg pa chen
po la'o/ /zhe 'gras pa zhes bya ba ni/ theg pa dman pa la'o/ /yun ring por lta ba ni/ 'khor ba yongs su bzung ba'i phyir ro/ /byas pa mi gzo ba ni/ sdig pa byas pa rnams la phyir lan
mi glon pa ste/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ gtong ba'ang shin tu thong zhig /ser sna can du'ang gyis shig /'dzin pa'i sems kyang med par gyis shig /gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams gtong ba shin tu gtong ba lags/ ji ltar na/ ser sna can lags/ ji ltar na/ 'dzin pa'i sems ma mchis pa lags/
bka' stsal pa/ gtong pa shin tu btang pa ni/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtang ba'i phyir sbyin pa btang ba'o/ /ser sna can du bya ba ni/ snod du ma gyur pa rnams la'o/ /'dzin pa
med pa'i sems su bya ba ni/ chos la slob dpon gyi dpe ma khyud med pa'i phyir te/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ gang dag spangs pa
de dag ni/ yongs su zungs shig /gang dag yongs su bzung ba de dag ni/ yal bar zhog cig /nad pa ltar yang gyis shig /na ba rnams kyang gsos shig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das| ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams gang dag spangs pa de dag yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ ji ltar na/ gang dag yongs su bzung ba de dag yal bar 'jog pa
lags| ji ltar na/ nad pa lta bur gyur pa lags/ ji ltar na/ na ba rnams kyang gso ba lags/ bka' stsal pa/ gang dag spangs pa de dag yongs su gzung ba ni/ log pa
nyid du nges pa'i sems can sangs rgyas thams cad kyis spangs pa de dag byang chub sems dpas yongs su gzung bar bya'o/ /gang dag yongs su bzung ba de dag yal bar gzhag pa
ni| slob pa dang / mi slob pa thams cad do/ /nad pa ltar yang bya zhing na ba rnams kyang gso bar bya ba ni/ bsam bzhin du rga ba dang na ba bstan nas so so'i skye bo rnams la chos bstan
pa ste| de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ bdud kyi las rnams ni/ 'bar bar gyis shig /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ zhi bar gyis shig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das| ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdud kyi las rnams ni/ 'bar bar bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ zhi bar bgyid pa lags/ bka'
stsal pa/ bdud kyi las 'bar bar byed pa ni/ dge ba'i chos la brtson pa rnams la'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhi bar byed pa ni/ chos thams cad nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs
ba med par sbyor ba ste/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ bdud rnams dang ni/ 'thab par gyis shig /ston pa ni/ ma tshol cig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji
ltar na| byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdud dang 'thab pa lags/ ji ltar na/ ston pa mi tshol ba lags/ bka' stsal pa/ bdud dang 'thab par bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' dag
gang gi tshes sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa de'i tshe bar chad bya ba'i phyir bdud brtson par byed pa na'o/ /ston pa mi tshol ba ni/ dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa ste/ de ni/
tshul lo| |rigs kyi bu dag /de ltar bas na/ gang dag nyan thos kyis smad par bya ba de khyed kyis ma smad cig /gang la nyan thos mngon par dga' ba de la khyed dga' bar ma byed cig /
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams gang dag nyan thos kyis smad par bgyi ba de dag la mi smod pa lags/ ji ltar na/ gang la nyan thos dga' ba
de la mi dga' ba lags/ /bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos ni/ skye ba'i gnas rnams la smod de/ de dag khyed kyis smad par mi bya'o/ /nyan thos ni/ rang
yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par dga' na/ de la khyed kyis mngon par dga' bar mi bya ste/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ 'jig rten na gnas par
gyis shig /'jig rten gyi chos rnams myong bar gyis shig /'jig rten gyis kyang ma gos par gyis shig /'jig rten na thogs pa rnams kyang sgrol cig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten na gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na/ 'jig rten gyi chos rnams myong ba lags/ ji ltar na/ 'jig rten gyis mi gos pa lags/ ji
ltar na| 'jig rten du thogs pa sgrol ba lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten na gnas par bya ba ni/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa rnams su'o/ /'jig rten gyi
chos rnams myong bar bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad po dag go /'jig rten gyis mi gos par bya ba ni/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis mi bskyod pa'i phyir ro/ /'jig rten du thogs pa
sgrol ba ni/ khams gsum gyi btson ra nas 'don pa ste/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ yang bar gyis shig /lci bar gyis shig /sdug bsngal bar gyis shig /bde
bar gyis shig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang ba lags/ ji ltar na/ lci ba lags/ ji ltar na/ sdug bsngal ba lags/ ji ltar na/
bde ba lags/ bka' stsal pa/ yang ba ni/ sems can thams cad kyi bya ba ci yod pa la snying las su byed pa'o/ /lci ba ni/ yid ma la brtan pa'o/ /sdug bsngal bar bya ba ni/
mi mthun pa'i gnyen po rnams la'o/ /bde bar bya ba ni/ bsod nams byas pa'i phyir te/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag/ de lta bas na/ mi snang bar yang gyis shig /thams cad
du snang bar yang gyis shig /byol bar bya ba rnams la ni/ byol cig /bsdad par bya ba rnams la ni/ sdod cig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'
rnams mi gda' ba'ang lags/ ji ltar na/ thams cad du gda' ba'ang lags/ ji ltar na/ byol bar bgyi ba rnams la byol ba lags/ ji ltar na/ bsdad par bgyi ba rnams la
sdod par bgyid ba lags/ /bka' stsal pa/ mi snang bar bya ba ni/ ltang ba dang 'khrul ba thams cad las yang dag par 'das par bya ba'o/ /thams cad du snang bar yang bya ba ni/ byang chub kyi phyogs
kyi chos yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir ro/ /byol bar bya ba rnams las 'byol ba ni/ 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa rnams lags so/ /bsdad par bya ba rnams la sdod pa ni/ sems can tshogs
par bya par phyir te/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ ma byas pa rnams la'ang gnas par gyis shig /byas pa rnams la'ang gnas
par gyis shig /byas pa dang ma byas pa rnams la'ang sems mnyam par gyis shig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma bgyis pa rnams
la'ang gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na/ bgyis pa rnams la'ang gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na/ bgyis pa dang ma bgyis pa rnams la'ang sems mnyam pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ ma
byas pa rnams la gnas pa ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir ro/ /byas pa rnams la gnas pa ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba byas pa de'i gong ma'i chos dang sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir ro/ /
byas pa dang ma byas pa rnams la sems mnyam par bya ba ni/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams la bye bag med pa'i 'du shes su bya ba ste/ de ni/ tshul
lo| |rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ snying po med pa las kyang snying po tshol cig /snying po la'ang snying po med pa'i 'du shes skyod cig /snying po dang snying po med pa la'ang spyod cig /gsol
pa| bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po ma mchis pa la snying po tshol ba lags/ ji ltar na/ snying po la snying po ma mchis par 'du shes bskyed pa
lags/ ji ltar na/ snying po dang snying po ma mchis pa la spyod pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ snying po med ces bya ba ni/ lus dang / srog dang / longs spyod rnams te/ de las dam pa'i chos
yongs su rdzogs par bya bas snying po btsal ba'o/ /snying po zhes bya ba ni/ 'dus ma byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la gzung ba'i phyir de la snying po ma yin pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /snying
po dang snying po ma yin pa la spyod pa ni/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la blo btang ste/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ dam bcas pa ni/ nyams par gyis shig /
tshul khrims ni/ ma nyams par gyis shig /tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams la ni/ ltos shig /tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la ni/ yal bar zhog cig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dam bcas pa nyams par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na/ tshul khrims ma nyams pa lags/ ji ltar na/ tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams la lta ba
lags| ji ltar na/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la yal bar gzhog pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ dam bcas pa nyams par bya ba ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gsong ma dang gong ma la lhag par
dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /tshul khrims nyams par bya ba ni/ byang chub kyi sems la lhag par dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la lta ba ni/ tshul khrims la sbyar ba'i phyir
ngo / tshul khrims dang pa rnams la yal bar gzhag bzhan bya ba byas pa'i phyir te/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ gzhan
gyi nor la dga' bar gyis shig /rang gi nor ni/ yongs su thong zhig /nye bar gnas par gyis shig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
gzhan gyi nor la dga' ba lags/ ji ltar na/ rang gi nor yongs su gtong ba lags/ ji ltar na/ nye bar gnas pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ gzhan gyi nor la mngon par
dga' ba zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams la rjes su yi rang bar bya'o/ /rang
gi nor yongs su gtang ba ni/ rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sems can thams cad la yongs su gtang bar bya'o/ /nye bar gnas par bya ba ni/ byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir

te| de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ mchog tu phyin par yang gyis shig /sems dma' bar yang gyis shig /le lo can du'ang gyis shig/ rtag tu brtson par yang gyis shig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mchog tu phyin pa lags/ ji ltar na/ sems dma' ba lags/ ji ltar na/ le lo can lags/ ji ltar na/ rtag tu brtson pa lags/ bka'
stsal pa| mchog tu phyin pa ni/ shes rab dang ye shes kyis so/ /sems dma' ba ni/ nga rgyal med pa'i phyir ro/ /le lo can ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis 'thob par bya ba la'o/ /
rtag tu brtson pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la ste/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ mi srun par yang gyis shig /dul ba'i sa la gnas par yang gyis shig /'jigs
par yang gyis shig /seng+ge'i rtsal gyis rnam par gnon par yang gyis shig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mi srun pa lags/ ji ltar na/ dul
ba'i sa la gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na/ 'jigs pa lags/ ji ltar na/ seng+ge'i rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ mi srun par bya ba ni/ bdud thams cad gdul
ba'i phyir ro/ /dul ba'i sa la gnas pa ni/ sems can cang shes gdul ba'i phyir ro/ /'jigs par bya ba ni/ sdig pa thams cad las so/ /seng+ge'i rtsal gyis rnam par gnon par bya ba ni/
phas kyi rgol ba thams cad dma' dbab pa'i phyir te/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ yid du 'ong bar yang gyis shig /yid du mi 'ong bar yang gyis shig /smad du med par
yang gyis shig /smad du yod par yang gyis shig /gsol phu/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yid du 'ong ba lags/ ji ltar na/ yid du mi 'ong ba lags/
ji ltar na/ smad du ma chis pa lags/ ji ltar na/ smad du chis pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba ni/ yon tan gyis phyug pa'i phyir
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs su byin pa'o/ /yid du mi 'ong ba na/ mngon par shes pa thams cad kyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i phyir bdud thams cad kyi yid du mi 'ong ba'o/ /smad du med pa
ni| lus dang / ngag dang / yid yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro/ /smad du yod pa ni/ mi dge ba'i chos thams cad la smod pa'i phyir te/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ rma
byung ba rnams la rma ma 'byin cig /rma ma byung ba rnams la rma byung zhig /ye shes tshol cig/ ye shes kyi bya ba rnams la dga' bar ma byed cig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rma byung ba rnams la rma mi 'byin pa lags/ ji ltar na/ rma ma byung ba rnams la rma 'byin pa lags/ ji ltar na/ ye shes tshol ba lags/ ji ltar
na| ye shes kyi bgyi ba rnams la mi dga' ba lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rma byung ba rnams zhes bya ba ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ste/ de la rma dbyung bar mi bya'o/ /rma
ma byung ba rnams zhes bya ba ni/ so so'i skye bo thams cad de/ de dag ni/ rma dbyung bar bya'o/ /ye shes btsal bar bya ba ni/ zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa'o/ /ye shes kyi bya ba la
dga' bar mi bya ba ni/ 'dus ma byas su ltung bar mi bya ba ste/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag/ de lta bas na/ mnyam par gzhag par yang gyis shig /sems rnam par g.yeng
bar yang gyis shig /sems mi gnas par yang gyis shig /rtag tu snyoms par zhugs par yang gyis shig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
mnyam par bzhag pa lags/ ji ltar na/ sems rnam par g.yeng bar bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na/ sems mi gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na/ rtag tu snyoms par zhugs pa lags/
bka' stsal pa/ mnyam par gzhag pa ni/ byang chub kyi sems kyis so/ /sems rnam par g.yeng bar bya ba ni/ nyan thos kyi sems las so/ /mi gnas pa ni/ de la ma chags pa'i phyir
ro| |rtag tu snyoms par zhugs pa ni/ sems can thams cad sems mnyam pa'i phyir te/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ bsreg par bya ba ni/ sregs shing / tshig
pa ni| skyed cig /skyed pa ni/ thod zhig /rnam par phye ba ni/ sos shig/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsreg par bgyi ba sreg pa lags/
ji ltar na/ tshig pa rnams skyed pa lags/ ji ltar na/ skye pa rnams gtong pa lags/ ji ltar na/ rnam par phye na rnams sdud pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ bsreg par bya ba sreg pa ni/ nyon
mongs pa thams cad shes rab kyi mes sreg pa'o/ /tshig bskyed pa na/ srabs kyis phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams gzung ba'o/ /skyes nas
gtong ba ni/ sems can thams cad kyi bya ba ci yod pa la snying las su bya ba'o/ /rnam par phye bas bsdu ba zhes bya ba de ni/ yongs su bsngo ba'i tshig bla dwags te/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /
rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ dus ma yin pa ni/ dus su shes par gyis shig /dus ni/ dus ma yin par shes par gyis shig /dus dang dus ma yin pa la mkhas par yang gyis
shig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus ma lags pa la dus 'tshal ba lags/ ji ltar na/ dus la dus ma lags par 'tshal ba
lags| ji ltar na/ dus dang dus ma lags pa la mkhas pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ gang nyan thos kyis thob par bya ba'i dus de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i dus ma yin no/ /pha rol
tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' dus so/ /dus dang dus
ma yin pa la mkhas par bya ba ni/ dus bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir te/ de ni/ tshul lo/ rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ 'byor ba ni/ phye shig /ma 'byor pa ni/
sbyor cig /'byor pa dang / ma 'byor pa la chags par yang ma byed cig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'byor pa 'byed pa lags/ ji
ltar na| ma 'byor pa ni/ sbyor ba lags/ ji ltar na/ sbyor ba dang / mi sbyor ba la ma chags pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'byor pa ni/ phyin ci log bzhi 'khor ba'i 'dam dang
'byor pa ste/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' dbye bar bya'o/ /ma 'byor pa ni/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshul bzhin yid la bya ba ste/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpas sbyar ba'o/ /'byor
pa dang ma 'byor pa la chags par mi bya ba ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa dang / so so'i skye bo'i spyod pa la ma chags par bya ba ste/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag/ de lta
bas na| dbugs phyin pa rnams ni/ dbugs ma phyung zhig /dbugs ma phyin pa rnams ni/ dbugs phyung zhig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
dbugs phyin pa rnams dbugs mi 'byin pa lags/ ji ltar na/ dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ dbugs phyin pa rnams dbugs mi dbyung ba ni/
yongs su smin pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par mi pa'o/ /dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs dbyung ba ni/ yongs su ma smin pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba ste/ de ni/
tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ rma byung bar yang gyis shig /ma rmas par yang gyis shig /rma byung ba rnams ni/ sos par yang gyis shig /
rma ma byung ba rnams ni/ ma dbyung zhig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rma 'byin pa lags/ ji ltar na/ ma rmas pa lags/ ji ltar na/ rma
byung ba rnams gso ba lags/ ji ltar na/ rma ma byung ba rma mi 'byin pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rma byung ba ni/ yan lag dang nying lag yongs su btang ba'i phyir ro/ /ma rmas par bya
ba ni| sems kyis so/ /rma byung ba rnams gso ba ni/ ltung ba byung ba rnams chos bzhin du bcos pa'o/ rma ma byung ba rma mi dbyung ba ni/ srog gi phyir yang bslab pa las 'gal bar mi bya
ba ste| de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ nye bar 'tshor med par yang gyis shig /sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar yang gyis shig /ma bsags pa rnams kyang
