du mi rung ngo / /log par lta ba'i mdun du mi rung ngo / /rgyal po ma gtogs pa gzhan su'i mdun du'ang bshad du mi rung ngo / /mi ngan pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas
kyi tshul khrims ma mnos pa ni/ mid byol song zhes bya'o/ /gar skyes gar skyes kyang dkon mchog gsum mi mthong zhing rdo shing dang mtshungs sems med de/
ming chos log pa zhes bya'o/ /log pa la lta ba'i rnams ni/ shing dum pa dang mtshungs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu ngan pa'i mdun du sangs rgyas rabs
bdun gyi tshul khrims bshad de bstan na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu sems yid ches te rab tu byung na/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims dam pa mnos la ched
kar sems bskyed de 'phags pa'i tshul khrims bshig na/ sbyin bdag go cog yon blang du mi rung ngo / /gcig tu ni/ rgyal po'i khab kyis ris la'ang 'gror
mi rung / rgyal po'i chu la'ang 'thung du mi rung ste/ 'dre chen po lnga stong gis rtag par de'i mdun bcad nas 'dre na re/ dgra chen po khyim dang / mkhar dang /
yul gyi nang du 'ongs so/ /zhes zer te/ de rnams kyis khor mor mi de'i rjes phyags so/ /'jig rten na re'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi nang du 'gro'o/ /zhes zer te mig gi
mthong du 'ong mi dga'o/ /tshul khrims bshig pa ni/ byol song dang mtshungs/ shing dum pa dang mtshungs te/ drang po'i tshul khrims bshig na ltung ba'o/ /
sangs rgyas kyi bu sems gcig tu brtul te rtag par gzungs su bzung ste kha ton du'ang klog go /pags pa bshus te ni/ shog shog byas/ khrag phyung bas
ni| snag tshar byas/ rus pa bcag ste smyug gur byas la sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims kyi yi ge bri'o/ /shing gi shun pa dang / thong
kar la bris te rtag par rin po che sna bdun dang / rin med pa'i spos dang / me tog la sogs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi gze ba dang snod byas te/ nang du
chos kyi yi ge tshul khrims kyi glegs bam gzhug go /de la chos kyi bzhin du ri mo ma byas na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu rtag par sems rgya cher bskyed
de yul mkhar dang / khang khyim mo cog tu phyin te sems can no cog ni/ mthong na/ khyod la sogs pa sems can no cog thams cad dkon mchog
gsum la phyogs shing tshul khrims bcu nos shig ces bsgo ba'i rigs so/ /byol song gi khams shig na'ang sems la bsam khar smras te/ khyod
ni| byol song na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems skyed cig ces bsam zhing bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni/ ri lung dbye thang ga la gnas kyang
rung ste| sems can no cog kun byang chub sems dpa'i sems skye bar byos shig /byang chub sems dpa' sems can ma bstan ma bcos na ltung ba'o/ /sangs
rgyas kyi bu rtag par bstan cing bcos pa'i snying rje chen po bskyed nas chos byed pa dang / ya rabs la sogs pa sbyin bdag dang / 'du ba mang bo'i nang du 'greng
la gos skya bo gyon te chos bshad du mi rung ngo / /gos skya bo gyon pa 'du ba mang po'i nang du chos bshad na/ chos kyi mkhan po ni/ sa mthon por 'dug la
spos dang me tog gis yon gsol te mtha' bzhir nyan pa'i rnams dma' ba na 'khod la gus par mnyan to/ /pha ma la sri zhu mi 'gal bar bya ba dang /
slob mas mkhan po la bya ba bzhin chos la'ang de bzhin gus par bya'o/ /bram ze me lha can chos byed pa bzhin gus par bya'o/ /de bzhin ma byas te chos
'chad pa bo chos bzhin du ma bshad na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu kun kyang the tshom med pa'i yid kyis khrims nos shig /rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / slob
ma sde bzhi dang / bdag mtho zhing btsan snyems te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dang tshul khrims bshig pa nan tur gyis chos byas te nga'i slob ma rnam bzhi rab
tu byung zhing chos byed par mi ster te/ bgegs gcig tu na sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / mchod rten 'dzugs shing chos dang tshul khrims yi ger 'brir mi
ster te| dkon mchog 'jig cing de lta bur ched kar chos 'jig pa ni/ ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu dge ba'i sems spyod pa la
rab tu phyung zhig/ legs pa'i ming snyan pa 'dod pa dang / gso ba'i khe'i phyir rgyal po dang / blon po'i mdun du sangs rgyas bdun gyi tshul khrims bshad de/
dge slong dang dge slong ma la byang chub sems dpa'i khrims mi rigs par byin te slob ma rnams bcings btags na/ seng+ge'i lus la srin bu 'dug pas
seng+ge bdag gis sha zos pa dang mtshungs te/ phyi'i srin bus sha zos pa ma yin no/ /de lta bas na/ sangs rgyas kyi bu mur 'dug dang / bdud kyis chos bshig
pa ma yin no/ /bdag gis chos bshig pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims mnos na sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims kyi rim gro bya ba ni/ pha mas pha ma bu
gcig pu la bsam pa dang mtshungs so/ /pha ma la sri zhu bya ba dang 'dra'o/ /mur 'dug dang / mi ngan pa la ngag ngan pa tshig ngan pas sangs rgyas kyi tshul
khrims la skur pa zer na/ mdud rtse kha gsum pa'i mdung rtse sum brgyas snying la btsugs pa dang / ral gri stong dbyug pa stong khris lus brdegs pa dang
mtshangs par bya ste/ bdag gi lus bskal pa brgya'i bar du sems can dmyal bar song yang sla'i/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims la tshig gcig ngan du zer
ba'i skad ni mi thos par smon to/ /bdag nyid kyis tshul khrims bshig pa gzhan la lan lon pa dang / zhar gyis zhar gyis tshul khrims bshig par bstan
pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ sri zhu dang mi 'gal ba'i sems med do/ /de lta bu byas na ltung ba'o/ /tshul khrims 'di dgu bslabs la sems gus par gzungs
su zungs shig /sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams tshul khrims yang pa bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad khyed la sogs pas rtag par gzungs su zungs shig /sngar 'das pa'i sangs
rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ kha ton zin to/ /da ltar gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni/ da ltar kha ton byas so/ /sangs
rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' phyis 'ongs pa'i rnams so/ /da de'i khar kha ton byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu nyon cig /phas pham pa bcu dang / ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa
brgyad cig 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kha ton zin/ da ltar gyi kha ton byas/ phyis kyang kha ton byed de/ nga'ang de bzhin da ltar kha ton byed do/ /de lta bas na/ khyed
la sogs pas sems can phal mang po rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang /
dge bsnyen mas byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims nos na 'grus par kha ton klogs la bkrol bshad de/ yi ger bris la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin
gyis skal pa rtag par 'dug ste khrims kyi glegs bam dus gsum gyi bar du tshul bzhin 'bab cing thogs pa med par byas te sems can thams
cad bstan cing bslab pa'i rgyun mi gcod cing sangs rgyas mthong la sangs rgyas gcig gis gcig la gtad de/ tshe tshe rabs su yang ngan song dang
bgegs brgyad kyi nang du'ang mi ltung zhing rtag par mi'i lam dang gnam gyi steng du skye'o/ /ngas da ltar shing 'di'i drung du 'dug ste sangs rgyas rabs
bdun gyi chos kyi khrims mdo tsam zhig phya ba khyed la sogs pa snying gcig tu brtul te so sor thar pa la bslabs la dga' zhing gus par gyis
shig /gzugs med pa'i gnam gyi rgyal po'i le'u slob pa'i blon 'debs pa'i nang nas gcig pu gcig bu nas rgya che zhing mngon bar bshad do/ /de'i slob
ma mkhas pa sum stong 'dug cing nyan pas sangs rgyas kyis kha ton bklags pa thos nas sems thag pa nas spyi bo la khyer te dga' gzha' nas rtag par
gzungs su bzung ngo / /de ltar shAkya thub pa sangs rgyas kyis yan chad pad+mo'i me tog gi snod kyi khams kyi rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku'i sems kyi gnas chos
kyi sgo mo le'u'i nang na zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims bcu bshad zin to/ /stong phrag brgya 'bum gyi thub pa'ang de bzhin no/ /dbang po chen po'i gnam gyi rgyal
po'i pho brang nas 'di'i gtsang ma'i shing drung na 'dug pa bcu'i gnas na chos dang tshul khrims kyi le'u yang bshad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
bsgo ba bshad kyis mi lang ngo / /mang po phal tag par gzungs su gzungs la kha ton du lhogs shig /de'i gzhung bkrol bshad pa de yin no/ /stong phrag brgya'ang
'bum gyi khams pad+mo'i me tog snod kyi khams rdul phra mo snyed kyi khams kyi thams cad kyi sems kyi snod/ tshul khrims kyi snod/ grangs med pa'i smon lam
gyi snod| yon tan dang / sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin 'dug pa'i snod de/ sangs rgyas thams cad grangs med/ chos kyi sgo mo'ang bshad zin to/ /stong phrag
brgya'i khams kyi nang na sems can thams cad kyis gzungs su bzung ste dga' zhing gus par byed do/ /sems kyi gnas rgya cher
phye ba'i gzungs ni/ sangs rgyas kyi me tog 'od kyi rgyal ba'i le'u'i nang nas bshad do/ /sangs rgyas bdun gyis tshig gi le'u bshad pa gcig ste/ sangs rgyas
rnam par gzigs kyis bstan pa'i tshul khrims bshad pa/ bzod pa'i dam pas dka' thub zhugs/ /bzod pa'i dam pas mya ngan 'da'/ /gzhan la gnod
pa de ni byang chub ma yin no/ /gnyis te spyi tor sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa/ mig can mi bde yod las byol te 'gro/ /mkhas pas 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten
na| |sdig pa kun kyang rnam par spongs/ /gsum ste thams cad skyob sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa/ gnod la mi smra mi sems te/ /so sor thar pa bzhin du
sdom| |zas kyi tshod kyang rig par bya/ /gnas kyang dben par 'jug par bya/ /rab tu sems dang ldan pa ni/ /de ni sangs rgyas bstan pa'o/ /bzhi ste log
par dad sel sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa/ ji ltar bung ba me tog gi /kha dog bsung la mi gnod par/ /khu ba blangs te 'phur ba bzhin/ /de bzhin byang chub
grong du spyod/ /gzhan gyi rnams la mi blta bar/ /gzhan gyis legs pa byas la'o/ /bdag rang nyid la ltos/ legs nyes ci byas pa/ lnga ste gser thub
sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa/ bsam gtan la ni ma byol bar/ /thub pa rnams kyis tshul thub slobs/ /mi bde bar yang mi 'gyur mgon/ /mngon par zhi bas
rtag tu dran pa'i yid/ /drug ste bsod skyabs sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa/ thams cad sdig pa mi bya'o/ /dge 'o cog ni rdzogs par bya/ /bdag gi sems kyang
shin tu gdul/ /de ni sangs rgyas bstan pa'o/ /bdun te shAkya thub pa sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa/ lus kyis su ni sdom pa dge /ngag gi sdom pa yang ni dge /
yid kyi sdom pa yang ni dge /dge 'o thams cad sdom pa ni/ /byang chub kun la mgon skyabs byed/ /nyon mongs thams cad kun las skyob/ /byang chub dag srung
yid kyang sdom/ /lus kyis mi dge mi bya zhing / /'di gsum las las rnam par skyongs/ /'thob bo drang srong gsungs pa'i lam/ /mi yis brdegs spyos sha
mi glan/ /sdig gi mi la sems mi 'khon/ /gshe ba'i mi la'ang rtag tu gcang / /mi yis ngan byas bdag mi byed/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rabs btsun byas/ /'jig
rten ra mda' pha skyabs nus/ /sangs rgyas 'dis tshul khrims bshad pa/ /ngas rgya cher bshad du kun rdzogs/ /sangs rgyas
kun dang slob ma rnams/ /chos kyi tshul khrims gus par 'dzin/ /gcig la gcig kyang gus par byos/ /chos la drin gzo cho ga tshang na/ /bya ba med pa'i
chos thob nus/ /tshul khrims yi ge bshad zin nas/ /sems gcig brtul te byang chub thob/ /chos kyi rgya mo rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/
AR+ya sUR+ya gar+b+ha nA ma ma hA bai bu l+yaM sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs
rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i
tshal bya ka lan+ta ka gnas pa na bzhugs te/ gang dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan grangs med dpag tu med pa dag nas der lhags pa'i byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med/ dpag tu med/ brjod du med pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas so/ /de bzhin du phyogs
bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan dag nas der 'dus te lhags pa'i nyan thos chen po grangs med/ dpag tu med/ brjod du med bdag gis kyang yongs
su bskor cing bdun gyis bltas so/ /de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan dag nas 'dir lhags pa brgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i
dbang po dang / lha'i dbang po dang / klu'i dbang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang / dri za'i dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang / nam mkha'
lding gi dbang po dang / mi'am ci'i dbang po dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po grangs med/ dpag tu med/ brjod du med pa dag gis kyang mi mjed kyi sangs
rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sa dang nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i lam gang bar gyur to/ /de bzhin du 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha gzhan dang
gzhan dag dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gzhan dang gzhan
grangs med dpag tu med pa dag kyang lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la gyen du lta zhing / bcom ldan 'das ring po mi thogs par mthar phyin pa/ nam mkha'
ltar snang ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rab tu 'byed pa/ dbugs rdub pa dang 'byung ba dran pa/ 'chi ba med pa'i sgo/ tshangs
pa'i gnas pa lung bstan pa ston pa na cang mi smra bar 'khod de/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sa dang nam mkha'i
lam gang bar gyur cing / da dung bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi char gyi ston pas tshim par ma gyur nas thal mo dag rab tu sbyar te bcom ldan 'das kho na
la blta zhing 'khod pa ni/ dper na/ nad pa dag sman pa la lta bar byed pa bzhin dang / mun pas khebs pa dag snang ba lta bar byed pa bzhin dang /
chu bos khyer ba dag chu 'gram du lta bar byed pa bzhin dang / sdug bsngal bar gyur pa dang / skyabs la lta bar byed pa bzhin te/ da ltar mi mjed kyi sangs
rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sa dang nam mkha'i lam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang / nyan thos dag dang / dbang po brgya byin dag
nas lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dag gi bar dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha gzhan dang gzhan dag nas mi dang ma yin pa rnams
gzhan dang gzhan dag gi bar bcom ldan 'das chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po la lta zhing thal mo rab tu sbyar te cang mi smra bar 'khod par gyur to/ /de'i tshe
tshangs pa chen po pad+ma 'bar ba'i dpal zhes bya ba sangs rgyas mang po la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa/ chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byas par gyur to/ /de nas tshangs pa chen po pad+ma 'bar ba'i dpal
stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar
ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa 'dis chos bshad par gsol ba btab bo/ /ring du gshegs shing myur ba'i rgyun dang ldan/ /zad
pa lhur mdzad mi g.yo 'od gsal ba/ /rtogs pa thams cad skyed par mdzad pa po/ /khyod gsung rab zhi rgyu skar tshul mkhyen mkhas/ /dbugs rdub pa dang
'byung ba dran pa mkhyen/ /tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po dag dang ldan/ /srid pa gsum po ji ltar dag 'gyur bar/ /sems can 'gro ba spong bar mdzad pa po/ /tshul
gcig ldan pa nyid kyi mkhyen mnga' ba/ /lha mi rnam pa mang po khri dag kyang / /so ma nyi rgal mdzad dge brnyes chu bo rgal/ /bde
'gro'i mkhyen pa myur dang ldan pa po/ /byang chub spyod dang sangs rgyas chos mngon sum/ /sems g.yo sems can kha cig 'dod klung lhung / /mun pas khebs
shing mig dang mi ldan pa'i/ /sdug bsngal thams cad bcom par gyur lags pa/ /mthos dge bral slob dpon mkhas ldan pa'i/ /skye bo bral la mi
dbang thugs rje skyed/ /mnyam pa'i chos nyan skye ba'i pha rol mchi/ /srid pa gcod pa bshad par mdzad du gsol/ /skye rlung pha rol gshegs thub thugs
rjes gsungs/ /blo 'chal skye mang sred pa'i dra ba'i lam/ /de dag thams cad nyon mongs rtsa ba can/ /der ni sems can 'khyams 'gyur gcad du gsol//
gang du sdug bsngal rab zhi dbang drug dang / /yid kyang zhi 'gyur sred skyon rgyal ba gsungs/ /sred pa bral ba sred rgyu mi mnga' ba/ /sems can gdung ba dpal
kun bral gyur pa/ /de slad thub pa thugs brtse ba yi rgyus/ /sred pa yi ni chu klung skem mdzad pa/ /myur du bde zhing 'chi ba ma mchis pa'i/ /chos kyang sred pa
gcod pa bshad par gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa pad+ma 'bar ba'i dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gang dag sngon chad pha rol
phyin| |spyod pa spyad cing spyod 'gyur ba/ /de dag nyan thos chos rnams la/ /nam yang dga' bar mi bya ste/ /sangs rgyas chos las nyams 'gyur ba'i/ /ltung ba
gnyis pa gzhan med de/ /de ni yang dang yang du yang / /gnyi gar sems ni 'jug pa yin/ /khro dang nyan thos chos rnams dang / /rkyen gyi byang chub 'jug pa yin/
chos gsum rnam par spangs pas na/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams rdzogs par 'gyur/ /skye gnas bzhi ldan sems can 'di/ /sangs rgyas zhing 'dir lhags pa
dang / /thams cad 'dod pa rten mi byed/ /thams cad mi sdug thob pa yin/ /'di na sems can mkhas pa gang / /byang chub mchog gi phyir zhugs shing / /gang blo gzungs dang bzod pa la/ /
brtson zhing legs par goms byas la/ /dbang po drug gi sgo bsdams shing / /skyil mo krung gis dran bzhag nas/ /rang gi spyod yul sa non pa/ /phyi ma'i dus
kyi de bzhin gshegs/ /nor bdun rab tu rdzogs pa'ang yin/ /'dir ni mi sdug tshul bshad na/ /kun gzhi gang yin sems can gyi/ /'ching ba brtan pa 'dir
bshad 'gyur/ /ngas ni chos kyi ser sna spangs/ /sems can srung phyir ma bshad de/ /'di la byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /byang
chub phyir sems 'dir ma btang / /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag gis/ /chos 'di yun ring gnas bya zhes/ /sa 'di yongs su spyad mdzad cing / /sa
'di byin gyis brlabs pa yin/ /de bzhin du ni khyod kyis kyang / /zhing 'di la ni rtse bar byos/ /de bzhin bzod pa dag gis rtses/ /bsdams nas yun
ring gnas par byos/ /nyan thos theg pa ngas bshad de/ /sems can chags las thar bya zhing / /phung po dag dang khams rnams dang / /skye mched
stong pa ngas bshad de/ /zhi gnas rnam pa bcu gsum dang / /lhag mthong nga yis bshad bya ste/ /'dod pa'i 'ching bas dam bcings pa'i/ /sems
can de yis rnam dag 'gyur/ /sems can rnams la snying brtse bas/ /nyan thos rnams kyi bden pa bzhi/ /chos rnams rtag tu yun gnas dang / /zag
pa med phyir ngas bshad do/ /nyan thos bden pas 'dul ba ni/ /srid pa'i mtsho las ngas bsgral lo/ /byang chub spyod pa thams cad kyang / /phyi nas khyed
la bstan par bya'o/ /de nas de'i tshe thams cad dang ldan pa'i mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma da
ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'di ni/ nyan thos kyi gtam yang dag par rab tu ston par mdzad kyi/ theg pa chen po'i gtam ni/ mi mdzad do snyam mo/ /de nas
de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sa yongs su
spyad pa'i phyir dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na chos kyi tshul ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang / da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gang dkon mchog gsum gyi
gdung rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / sprin po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding
dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa ma dad pa rnams mngon par dad par bya ba'i phyir dang / dad pa rnams phyir zhing 'phel bar
bya ba'i phyir dang / sems can chos la mngon par brtson pa dag dang / chos la gnas pa dag dang / yon tan gyis phyug pa dag dang / tshul khrims kyi dri dang yang
dag par ldan pa rnams bde ba la reg pa dang / rnam par mtho 'tsham pa med par bya ba'i phyir dang / byad grol gyi bde ba
yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang / ci nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di shin tu yon tan dag gis bsgo bar bya ba'i phyir dang / phyogs bcu na gnas
pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan thams cad kyang bsgo ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang / bla ma la gus pa dang / phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur par bya ba'i phyir
bdag cag nang du yang dag par 'jog par bzhed pas ma la bdag cag gis nga de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ste /
bdag cag thams cad kyis sa'i steng du skyil mo krung gis 'khod par bya zhing / rang rang gi rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i bzod pa
dang / gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / rnal 'byor dag gis gnas pa dag tu bya gor ma chag go snyam mo/ /de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po gang dag bskal pa brgyas nges par byung ba dag dang / gang dag sa bcu dag dang / gang dag mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa la gnas pa'i bar dag
dang / gang dag sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gzhan la rag ma las pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa dag dang / mi 'jigs pa thob pa dag gi bar
de dag thams cad sa steng 'dir skyil mo krung gis 'khod par gyur to/ /de bzhin du rang rang gi rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mchog thams cad kyi bzod pa dang / gzungs
dang / ting nge 'dzin dag la mnyam par bzhag pa dag tu gyur to/ /yang de'i tshe bsod nams kyi stobs ji lta ba bzhin du rgyu mthun pa'i rgyu'i stobs kyis byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mnyam par gzhog pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan byed pa de dag las
kha cig gi lus las 'od 'di lta bu byung ste/ dper na/ mar me'i 'od lta bu'o/ /kha cig gi ni/ skar mda' dang mnyam pa dag go /kha cig gi ni/ brgya
byin dang mnyam pa dag go /kha cig gi ni/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang mnyam pa nas kha cig gi ni/ zla ba dang mnyam pa'i bar dag go /kha cig gi
ni| nyi ma dang mnyam pa dag go /kha cig gi ni/ nyi ma gcig dang mnyam pa dag go /kha cig gi ni/ nyi ma gsum dang mnyam pa dag go /kha cig gi ni /
nyi ma lnga dang mnyam pa dag go /kha cig gi ni/ nyi ma stong dang mnyam pa'i bar dag go /kha cig ni/ lus las
ni| nyi ma bye ba rgya stong dang mnyam pa'i 'od dag byung ste/ mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i
snang ba chen po rgya che ba de lta bus 'jig rten khyab par gyur to/ /de dag gi lus las mchog tu sems can gzhan dag gi lus dang sems kyi bde
ba la reg pa dang / dga' ba dang / rab tu tshim par byed pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ lta ba ngan pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed
pa| lus kyi gnas ngan len thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ bkres pa dang skom pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad rab tu zhi
bar byed pa/ /khro ba thams cad dang / 'jig pa thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa dang / 'ching ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i 'od byung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi
zhing 'di srid pa gsum gyi btson ra'i sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa thams cad kyi bar rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di sems can thams cad
sangs rgyas la 'bab pa dag dang / chos la 'bab pa dag dang / dge 'dun gyi yon tan la dga' pa la mkhas pa dag 'khod par gyur to/ /yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi
zhing 'di phyogs bcu'i gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dang / stong pa ma yin pa dag dang / yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su dag pa ma yin
pa dag na kun nas lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger yang dag bar snang ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan mo mun pa byung ba na zla ba dang / nyi ma brgya stong shar nas lham
me| lhan ne/ lhang nge ba bzhin te/ de ltar de'i tshe mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang phyogs bcu'i gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa
dang / stong pa ma yin pa dag dang / yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su ma dag pa dag na kun nas mchog tu lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang ngar gyur to/ /de nas
sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang de dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag yod pa dang / gang dag bskal pa brgyas nges par byung ba dag dang / gang
dag sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gzhan la rag ma las pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa dag dang / mi 'jigs pa thob pa'i bar de dag sangs rgyas
kyi mthu sa de nas chas te sems kyi skad cig ma cig dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir zhugs nas gnas ji lta ba bzhin sa
steng du skyil mo krung gis 'khod par gyur to/ /de bzhin du rang gi dge ba'i phyogs la nan tan dag tu byed cing ji ltar dge ba'i phyogs kyi stobs bskyed pa thob
pa de dag dang / mi 'jigs pa'i rgyu dang rkyen dang ldan pa de dag gi lus las de 'dra ba kho na'i 'od byung bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong
gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor nas nyan thos chen po rnams la bka' stsal pa/ khyed bsam gtan gyi yul gyi mthu la ltos shig /byin gyi rlabs
kyi rgyus bdud thams cad kyi yul dang / klu thams cad kyi yul zil gyis mnan nas sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'dir chos kyi tshul
dang /dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir dang / gsal bar mdzad pa'i phyir mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad yongs
su spyad pa mdzad do/ /de bzhin du da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med/ dpag tu med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bsam gtan
dang / mngon par shes pa'i yul la rnam par rtse ba dang ldan pa dag gis mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i
phyir dang / gsal bar bya ba'i phyir dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen
po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa ma dad pa rnams dad par bya ba'i phyir dang / dad pa rnams phyir zhing 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir dang / sems can chos la
mngon par brtson pa dag dang / chos kyis gnas pa dag dang / yon tan gyis phyug pa dag dang / sems la dbang dang ldan par gyur pa rnams bde ba
la reg pa dang / rnam par mtho 'tsham pa med par bya ba'i phyir dang / nga'i bstan pa rab tu mi 'jig par bya ba'i phyir dang / byang grol gyi bde ba yongs su
rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir sa chen po 'di yongs su spyad par byas pa yin no/ /don de nyid byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rnams bsam gtan gyi yul dag gis rnam par rtse bar byed do/ /sa phyogs gang dang gang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di
dag 'khod cing bsam gtan gyi yul dag gis rnam par rtsen par byed pa de dang der da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ang kha cig
tu la lar nga 'das nas sems can 'khor ba'i 'jigs pas skrag par byed cing mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod pa dag sku gdung gi mchod rten dag byed du
'jug par 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi bzhugs khang dag gam/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs dag gam/ chos kyi bzhugs khang dag byed par 'gyur ro/ /
yang na der glegs bam du bri ba byas nas nga'i chos kyi sku'ang 'chang bar 'gyur ro/ /der yang mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang byed par 'gyur zhing /
der rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang 'bul bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+ya dang / shel dang / mu tig dmar po
dang / rdo'i snying po dang / sdug dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / dbyig dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru la sogs pa dang / dar yug dang / dril
bu dang / za 'og dang / gos ras bzang po dang / yul ka shi'i ras bzang po dang / dbu rten nad tshangs can dang / gding ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
dang | bdan dang / chos gos dang / mgur gyi rgyan dang / spos dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / lus 'dus pa dang / bla ma dang /
gus pa chen po dang / gces par byed pa dag tu 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe phyag sor bcu'i thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal
to| |de dag gi mchod pa ni/ de nas nga nyid kyis bzhes par mdzad de/ sems can de dag thams cad ni/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa gsum gyis
phyir mi ldog pa dag tu 'gyur ro/ /sa phyogs la lar ni/ gtsug lag khang dang / gnas khang dang / 'chags dang / dgon pa'i gnas dang / skyed mos
tshal dang / kun dga'i re ba dag rab tu shom par byed do/ /yang na nyan thos kyi chos kyi gnas pa rnams la mchod pa dang / rim gro rnam pa sna tshogs 'di
lta ste| chos go sa dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dag gis byed par 'gyur ba'am/ byed du 'jug
par 'gyur ro/ /gtsug lag khang dang / 'chags dang / dgon pa'i gnas de dag tu'ang bkur stir byas te chos nyan pa dang / rnam par gtan la dbab pa'i
gtam byed pa dag tu 'gyur ba'am/ glegs bam dag klog par 'gyur ro/ /gtsug lag khang dang / 'chag sa la sogs pa
de dag tu'ang yongs su gtong ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ zhing gi gzhi'am/ khyim gyi gzhi'am/ kun dga'i
ra ba'i gzhi'am/ bran dang / bran mo dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / rnga mo dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang / bong bu dang / phyugs gzhan dag dang /
snod spyad kyi yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs dag der yongs su gtong bar 'gyur zhing / nga'i nyan thos kyis chos kyi gnas pa rnams longs spyod par bya ba'i phyir
mal cha dang stan gyi yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs dag sems kyi rgyan gyi don dang / sems kyi yo byad kyi don dang / rnal 'byor gyi tshogs kyi don dang / byang
grol gyi bde ba don gyi mchog thob par bya ba'i phyir bsngo ba dag tu byed do/ /da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nga'i bstan pa la phan gdags pa'i phyir yongs
su gtong ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag yongs su gtong bar byed do/ /de bzhin du sems can de dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de dag
thams cad la ci nas kyang sems can de dag 'bras bu chen por 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir nga rjes su thugs rangs par mdzad do/ /bzhes par mdzad do/ /sems
can log par ltung ba'i chos can ma yin pa ngan 'gor gsum rnam par spangs pa de dag thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa gsum gyis phyir mi
ldog pa dag tu 'gyur ro/ /sems can bdag yun ji srid du 'khor bar 'khor bar 'gyur ba de srid du'ang longs spyod gnyis po chos kyi longs spyod dang zang
zing gi longs spyod dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /ri dang / nags khrod dang / shing ljon pa chen po dang / dgon pa dang / nags 'dabs gang du'ang rung
ste| da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na thar pa don du gnyer ba chos kyis gnas pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma sgra
bskyungs pa dag dang / bcom bskyungs pa dag dang / nang du yang dag 'jog gi tshul dang bcas pa dag dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang 'tsham pa
dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dag kyang gnas par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag gdul ba'i don du bsam gtan gyi yul gyi mthu la
ltos shig /bdud thams cad kyi yul dang / klu thams cad kyi yul zil gyis mnan nas sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs
te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa rnams kyis chos kyi tshul ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir sngon yang mi
mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di yongs su spyod pa mdzad de/ da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med pa dpag tu med pa gang dag
phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed nas nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir zhu ba dang / zhal blta ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang /
mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / nam mkha'i mig dang ldan pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ chos kyis gnas pa rnams
kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mnyan pa'i phyir lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang nga la snying nye ba'i phyir chos kyi tshul
ring du gnas par bya ba'i don dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcad pa'i don du bsam gtan gyi yul gyis sa steng du 'khod nas bdud thams
cad kyi yul tshar gcad pa'i phyir dang / 'khor bas skrag pa sbyin pa la mngon par brtson pa'i sems can de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di
yongs su spyod pa dag tu byed do/ /da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nga'i bstan pa 'di dang / dam pa'i chos sam/ dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan yun ji srid
gnas par chos kyis gnas pa'i dge slong rnams la khyim dang / kun dga'i ra ba dang / zhing dang / bran dang / bran mo'i bar gang su dag gis de ltar bsngos
pa de la sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong tshul khrims 'chal ba gang dag tha na 'dab ma gcig dang / 'bras bu gcig dang / me tog gcig cig yongs su
spyod pa dag tu byed na/ de ni/ mi blun po de la don ma yin pa dang / phan pa ma yin par 'gyur te/ de la gnod pa bzhi'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang
zhe na| phyogs thams cad du mi snyan pa chen po 'gro ba yin/ mdza' bo dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang /
rim gro ba sdug cing yid du 'ong ba dag dang myur du 'bral bar 'gyur ba yin/ nad tshabs chen po yun ring ba dag gis thebs par 'gyur ba yin/ de'i chos gos
dang lhung bzed gang yod pa'ang 'jigs pa chen po lngas 'phrog par 'gyur ba yin no/ /lnga gang dag gis she na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyal po dang / chom
rkun dang / me dang / chu dang / bgo skal la spyod pa mi mdza' ba dang lnga po de dag gis so/ /de'i 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'dod pa ma yin pa'i 'bras bu bzhi myur du 'grub
par 'gyur ba yin te/ bzhi gang dag yin zhe na/ lus zhig nas sems can dmyal ba chen po mi bzad par skye bar 'gyur ba yin/ de gal te brgya la res 'ga' zhig dus ring
zhig 'das nas sems can dmyal ba de nas shi 'phos nas 'brog dgon pa ro skam gyi nang du dud 'gor dang / yi dwags kyi ris su long ba dang rkang lag med pa dag tu skye
bar 'gyur zhing / de lo brgya stong mang po dag tu bkres pa dang / skom pas yongs su gdung ba chen po'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba yin/ gal te
brgya la res 'ga' zhig dus ring zhig 'das nas de dag shi 'phos nas lo brgya stong mang po dag tu sprul gdug pa long ba rdul za ba dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba yin/
de brgya la res 'ga' zhig de nas shi 'phos nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na/ 'on kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa stong pa dag tu mi nyid thob
pa rnyed par 'gyur zhing / mongs rtul ba dang / tshul du mi shes par 'gyur ba dang / mig ma tshang ba dang / lag pa ma tshangs ba dang / rkang pa ma tshang ba dang / khyi'i longs
spyod kyi kha zas la gdu zhing skyag khungs sa'i kha zas za ba dang / 'dam rdzab dang / phyag dar khrod na nyal ba dang / 'brog dang / dgon pa dang / lam po che rnams
na 'tsho bar 'gyur la/ de de nas shi 'phos nas kyang yang sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir de'i 'bras bu 'dod pa ma yin pa
de ltar lci ba 'byung zhe na/ 'di ltar sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong de ni/ 'di ltar chos kyis gnas pa rnams la khyim dang / zhing dang / kun dga'i ra ba dang / bran
dang | bran mo dang / phyugs dag gi bar bsngos pa dag 'phrog nas gang zag rang gi yongs su longs spyod pas longs spyod par byed pa'i phyir te/ sdig pa spyod
pa'i dge slong de lta bu de ni/ de ltar ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul med par bya ba dang / rnam
par gzhig pa dang / rgyun gcad pa dang / nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa yin no/ /de bzhin du dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung med par bya ba nas nub par bya ba'i
bar du brtson pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dge ba'i phyogs ni/ tshogs dang ldan pa yin la/ chos kyi tshul dang
dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yang dge ba'i phyogs kyis rab tu phye ba yin te/ de'i phyir de nyid kyi mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa lci ba mngon
par 'grub pa yin no/ /de nas gnas brtan ga ya 'od srung gis mchi ma blags nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ mi nyid
rnyed pa ni/ ma thob kyang mi bsngo'i/ /rab tu byung nas bza' ba dang btung ba'i slad du log par sgrub pa ni/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ ga ya 'od srung chen po/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ gang du de'i sngon gyi las rnams zad pa dag tu 'gyur ba'i sems
can dmyal bar gnas pa ni/ bla'i/ 'di na gang gzhan du spyod pa ni/ de lta ma yin no/ /'on kyang skyes bu blun po kha cig mi nyid thob pa rnyed par dka' ba
rnyed de legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba gang la sdug bsngal thams cad zad pa dang / zag pa thams cad mthar thug par 'gyur ba ngo mtshar rmad du
byung ba'i rab tu byung ba rnyed par dka' ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob nas 'od kyang skyes bu blun po de dag gang gis mchod par mi 'gyur
ba dang | bza' btung dang bral bar 'gyur ba mi dge ba'i phyogs rnal 'byor yid la byed pa yongs su bsam nas rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs
dang | dmangs rigs dad pa can dag gis khyim dang / zhing dang / kun dga'i ra ba dang / skyed mos tshal dang / bran dang / bran mo nas rkang bzhi pa dag gi
bar dge slong chos kyis gnas pa/ yon tan gyis phyug pa dag longs spyod par bya ba'i phyir dang / dge ba'i phyogs dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir te ltar bsngos
pa la sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong de mang du thos pa'i mthu'am/ khyim na gnas pa'i mthus de dag la bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa 'phrog nas
bdag nyid kyis gang zag gi 'du shes kyis yongs su spyod par byed de/ skyes bu blun po de'i log par sgrub pa de ni/ de lta bur 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
la rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gang dge slong chos kyis gnas pa/ yon tan gyis phyug pa dag la
de ltar bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa 'phrog nas bdag nyid kyis yongs su spyod par bgyid pa'i dge slong rab tu byung
ba'i mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu de lta bu 'byung lags na/ dpe tsam du bgyi na gang yang khyim na gnas par gyur la/ dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams la
de ltar bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa 'phrog nas bdag nyid kyis yongs su spyod par bgyid na/ de bsod nams ma lags pa'i phung po
ji snyed cig dang ldan par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po thong / khyod kyis smras pa des ci zhig bya /
gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ dge slong chos kyis gnas pa/ yon tan gyis phyug pa de lta bu dag la longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod
pa dag gis stsol bar ni/ bgyid kyi/ 'phrog par ni/ mi bgyid lags so/ /'on kyang slad ma'i dus na rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs
dang | dmangs rigs ma dad pa 'jig rten pha rol gyis 'jigs par mi lta ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / dge slong chos kyis gnas pa/ yon tan
gyis phyug pa dag la de ltar bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa 'phrog nas bdag nyid kyis yongs su spyod par bgyid pa gang dag lags pa de dag gi
rgud par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ gal te ngas lung bong lta bu'i rgyal rigs dag nas dmangs rigs
dag gi bar dag chos kyis gnas pa/ yon tan gyis phyug pa dag la de ltar bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa 'phrog nas bdag nyid kyis longs
spyod par byed pa gang dag yin pa de dag gi log par sgrub pa 'byung ba de bshad na ni/ de'i tshe de dag kyang nga'i bka' bstan pa'i 'phrin las kyi skabs thob
nas spong ba dag tu byed la yid ches ba dag tu mi byed do/ /de dag ni/ phung bar 'gyur ba'i 'jigs pa chen po'i gnod pa gnyi ga dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /bcom
ldan 'das la rgyal po gzugs can snying pos lan gnyis su'ang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa/ bstan
du gsol/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gang dag 'jig rten pha rol gyis 'jigs par lta zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa'i chos
'dul ba legs par bstan pa yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / gsal bar bgyid pa'i rgyal rigs nas dmangs rigs kyi bar
de dag gi rigs rgyud rigs btsun pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de dag ni/ khyod kyi bka'i 'phrin las bstan pa thos nas
stobs dang brtson pa mchog tu chen pos rgyal ba'i bstan pa legs par bstan pa gsal bar bgyid pa dang / yongs su skyong ba dag tu 'gyur zhing / gang zag
de ltar yang dag par zhugs pa dag dang / chos kyis gnas pa dag dang / yon tan gyis phyug pa dag la'ang mchod pa bgyid pa dang / srung ba bgyid pa dang /
yongs su skyong bar bgyid par 'gyur lags so/ /khyim na gnas pa dang / rab tu byung ba de dag kyang 'phrog par mi bgyid lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan
'das| khyim na gnas pa gang gis gang zag chos kyis gnas pa dag gi longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa 'phrog nas bdag nyid kyis yongs su spyod par
bgyid pa de'i rgud par 'gyur ba gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ gal te ngas ma 'ongs pa'i dus na lung bong lta bu'i
rgyal rigs nas dmangs rigs kyi bar dag chos kyis gnas pa/ yon tan gyis phyug pa dag la de ltar bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa 'phrog
cing bdag nyid kyis longs spyod par byed pa gang dag yin pa de dag gis log par sgrub pa 'byung ba de bshad na ni/ de dag kyang nga'i bka' bstan pa'i 'phrin
las kyi skabs thos nas spong ba dag tu byed la yid ches pa dag tu mi byed de/ de dag ni/ phung par 'gyur ba'i gnod pa chen po'i gnod pa gnyis ka dang ldan
par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gzugs can snying pos lan gsum du'ang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bstan du gsol/ bde
bar gshegs pa/ bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang dag 'jig rten pha rol gyis 'jigs par lta zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi chos 'dul ba legs
par bstan pa yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / gsal bar bgyid pa'i rgyal rigs nas dmangs rigs kyi bar dag gi rigs rgyud rigs btsun pa dag 'byung bar
'gyur lags so/ /de dag gis ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'i 'phrin las bstan pa thos nas stobs dang / brtson pa mchog tu chen pos rgyal ba'i bstan pa
legs par bstan pa gsal bar bgyid par 'gyur zhing / gang zag de ltar yang dag par zhugs pa dag dang / chos kyis
gnas pa dag dang / yon tan gyis phyug pa dag la'ang mchod pa bgyid pa dang / srung ba bgyid pa dang / yongs su skyong bar bgyid par 'gyur lags so/ /
khyim na gnas pa dang / rab tu byung ba de dag kyang 'phrog par mi bgyid lags so/ /chos kyis gnas pa de dag gi longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa
'phrog par mi bgyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ legs so legs so/ /khyod kyi spobs pa legs so/ /rgyal
po chen po/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang dag rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dag gis chos kyis gnas pa rnams la
khyim gyi gzhi dang / zhing gi gzhi dang / kun dga'i ra ba'i gzhi dang / skyed mos tshal dang / bran dang / bran mo dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / na
ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dag de ltar bsngos pa dang / rkang pa bzhi ba'i bar bsngos pa'ang 'phrog par byed pa'am rku bar byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/
rgyal rigs nas dmangs rigs kyi bar de thams cad ni/ mthong ba'i chos la 'byung ba 'dod pa ma yin pa'i chos nyi shu dang myur du ldan par 'gyur ro/ /nyi
shu gang dag ce na/ lha rnams kyis yongs su btang ba yin/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag tu'ang de'i mi snyan pa grags par 'gyur ba yin/ mdza' bshes
dang snag gi gnyen mtshams dag gis kyang de'ang yongs su gtong bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i dgra bo dag kyang mang bar 'gyur ba yin/ nor dang nor gyi yo
byad dag las kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par g.yeng ba'ang mang ba yin/ yan lag ma tshang bar 'gyur ba'ang yin/ de gnyid med pa
yin| rtag tu des sred pas gnon par 'gyur ba'ang yin/ de'i bza' ba dang btung ba'ang dug gi bya ba byed pa yin/ sdug pa dang yid du 'ong ba dag dang
myur du 'bral ba thob pa yin/ rtag tu gzhan dag dang 'thab mo 'byung ba yin/ pha dang / ma dang / spun dang / chung ma dang / bu mo dang / bran dang / bran mo
dag kyang bsgo ba bzhin mi byed pa yin/ de'i gsang sngags gsang ba dag dang / nor gsang ba dang / slas gsang ba dang / de'i dngos po gsang ba rnams kyang
thams cad gsang shor ba dag tu 'gyur ba yin/ bsgo skal la spyod pa mi mdza' ba la sogs pa lngas kyang longs spyod dag chud
za bar 'gyur ba yin/ nad tshabs chen po dag gis kyang myur du thebs par 'gyur ba yin/ sman dang rim gro ba dang bral zhing sha dang khrag bskams nas
sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba yin/ rang gi bshad gci dag gi nang du 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba yin te/ rgyal po chen po/ 'dod pa ma
yin pa'i las nyi shu po de dag dang myur du ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gang dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams la bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa
dang | nor gyi yo byad 'phrog par byed cing / bdag nyid kyis kyang yongs su spyod par byed pa de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar
med par skyes par 'gyur ro/ /de der yang tshe bskal bar lcags dang zangs zhun 'thung bar 'gyur zhing lcags kyi thu lum za bar 'gyur la/ me'i gos
dang | longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa spyod par byed cing gnod pa mi bzad pa chen po rnam pa sna tshogs nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba yin no/ /tshe bskal pa zad
nas kyang de nas shi 'phos nas 'brog dgon pa ro gam dag gi nang du lam du skyes pa'i yi dwags rnams dang skal ba mnyam par rkang pa dang / lag pa dang /
mig ma tshang bar skye bar 'gyur ro/ /der yang phyogs bzhi nas langs pa'i rlung kun tu tsha ba dag gis kun tu gdung bar byed cings spu gri dang 'dra ba'i steng du
dmyal bar byed/ yongs su dmyal bar byed de/ de der lo brgya stong mang por sdug bsngal de lta bu nyams su myong bar byed pa yin no/ /de gal te brgya la res
'ga' zhig de nas shi 'phos nas kyang rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du lus dpag tshad brgya pa'i sha nar nar por skye bar 'gyur ro/ /sngon gyi las kyi rgyus de'i dpag tshad
khor yug gi chu zangs zhun ma ltar dmar po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de der yang lo brgya stong mang por chu'i nang du sems can dmyal ba'i gnod pa myong bar
byed pa yin no/ /de de nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'brog dgon pa chen por brdzus te skye ba sha nar nar po chen po ri dang mnyam pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bzhi kun
tu'ang rlung kun tu tsha ba dag gis kun tu sreg par byed do/ /der yang phyogs bzhi nas ri dwags dang bya dag lhags te yongs su za ba dag tu byed do/ /de brgya la res
'ga' dus ring zhig 'das nas de nas shi 'phos nas yang sems can dmyal ba chen po dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas kyang shi
'phos nas yang dang yang du log par sgrub pa chen po de lta bu nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ yongs su brtag pa nye bar bzung na/ de brgya lam na res 'ga' zhig
mi rnams dang skal pa mnyam par skyes na'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa dag tu mig ma tshang ba dang / tshul du mi shes par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /
rgyal po chen po/ gang chos kyis gnas pa dag la bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa dang / nor gyi yo byad 'phrog par byed pa de'i log par sgrub
pa de ni| de lta bu yin no/ /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po mchi ma dag phyung nas gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ skyes bu gang zag de lta bu
ni| sems can dmyal ba na gnas par mi bsngo lags kyi/ gang gis mi nyid rnyed pa thob nas bsod nams ma lags pa chen po de lta bu kun tu spyod par
'gyur ba'i mi nyid rnyed pa ni/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rgyal rigs
chos kyis gnas pa khyed cag gi lag tu gang zag yongs su gtad kyi/ srungs shig /yongs su srungs shig /rab tu byung ba'am/ khyim na gnas pa gang dge slong
chos kyis gnas pa rnams la de ltar bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa dang / nor gyi yo byad 'phrog par byed pa de la khyed kyis ci nas kyang chos dang mthun
pas chad pas gcad par bya'o/ /rgyal pos gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gal te gang dag dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams la de ltar bsngos pa'i longs
spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa dang / nor gyi yo byad 'phrog par byed pa'i khyim na gnas pa dang rab tu byung ba de dag ci nas chos dang mthun pas chad pas gcod par mi bgyid
cing / de la rgyal po btang snyoms par gnas par bgyid lags na/ rgyal rigs de bsod nams ma lags pa'i phung po ji snyed cig bskyed par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par nyan thos dang / rang rgyal ba dag dang bcas pa'i sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams
ji snyed yod pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de lta bu dang sems can gcig cig ldan par gyur na/ sems can de nyan thos dang / rang rgyal ba thams cad las ches khyad
par du 'phags pa dang / ches bsod nams dang ldan par 'gyur ba yin nam/ rgyal pos gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/
de de ltar lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ sems can de ches khyad par du 'phags pa lags te/ de gang la sems can 'tsho ba kun gyi nang na nyan thos dang / rang
rgyal ba thams cad las ches bsod nams dang ldan pa ni/ skyes bu 'ga' zhig 'byung bar bas lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/
gal te sems can snga ma de bsod nams kyi phung po ji lta bu dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de lta bu dang sems can thams cad ldan pa dag tu gyur la/ de la gang
sems can 'tsho ba thams cad kyi yan lag dag rnam par gcod par byed cing / mig 'byin pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dag
rnam par gcod par byed pa'i skyes bu 'ga' zhig byung bar gyur na/ rgyal po chen po/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de bsod nams ma yin pa sdig pa'i las
ji snyed cig bskyed par 'gyur/ de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po mchi ma dag phyung nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen
po| lan thob cig /lan thob cig /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po shum zhes ngu bzhin du gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gang sems can bsod nams
dang ldan pa de lta bu gcig gi yan lag dag rnam par gcod par bgyid cing mig 'byin pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dag rnam par gcod par bgyid
pa'i skyes bu de'ang bsod nams ma lags pa sdig pa'i las grangs ma mchis/ tshad ma mchis/ dpag tu ma mchis/ dpe ma mchis pa bskyed par 'gyur ba lags na/ gang
de lta bu'i bsod nams dang ldan pa'i sems can thams cad kyi yan lag dag rnam par gcod par bgyid cing / mig 'byin pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lag pa dang /
rkang pa dag rnam par gcod pa lta ci smos lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa 'tsho
ba'am| yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'ang rung ste/ lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos zad par 'gyur ba'i bar du khyim na gnas pa dang / rab tu byung ba gang chos kyis
gnas pa/ yon tan gyis phyug pa dag la de ltar bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa dang / nor gyi yo byad dang / zhing gi gzhi dang / khyim gyi gzhi dang /
kun dga'i ra ba dang / skyed mos tshal dang / bran dang / bran mo dang / rkang bzhi pa dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal
cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dag yod pa de las 'phrog gam rku ba de la rgyal rigs btang snyoms par byed cing / rab tu byung ba dang / khyim
na gnas pa rkun ma de dag chad pa ci yod pa bzhin chad pas gcod du mi 'jug na/ rgyal rigs de bsod nams ma yin pa ches mang du skyed do/ /rgyal rigs ji lta ba
bzhin grong gi blar bskos pa dang / grong khyer gyi bla dang / grong rdal gyi bla dang / ljongs kyi blar bskos pa'ang de bzhin du btang snyoms par byed cing / de ltar rku ba'i sems
can da dag zlog par mi byed na/ de lta bu'i grong gi bla nas ljongs kyi bla'i bar de bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po ches mang du skyed do/ /de nas rgyal po gzugs can
snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ rgyal po nyid ni/ shin tu lci ba lags so/ /rgyal rigs ni/ bag ma mchis pa mang po dang ldan
par gnas pa lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gang yang rgyal po bag ma mchis par gnas shing / gang zag chos kyis gnas pa de lta bu dag srung bar
bgyid pa dang / de bzhin du de ltar bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa 'phrog pa'i sems can rnams sdig pa'i las de las zlog par bgyid pa dang / grong gi
bla nas ljongs kyi bla'i bar yang de bzhin du de ltar bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa dag rku ba'i sems can rnams sdig pa'i las de las slar zlog
par bgyid na/ de bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed cig bskyed par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ gal te ngas sngar
gsungs pa bzhin bsod nams kyi phung po de lta bu dang sems can thams cad ldan pa dag tu gyur la/ thams cad kyang btson rar bcug cing bkres pa dang skom
pa dag gis gzir bar gyur la/ de la gang sems can thams cad de lta bu'i bsod nams dang ldan pa dag btson ra de nas yongs su thar par byed cing / lo brgya
tshang bar yang sems can de dag thams cad la chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / na pa'i gsos sman dang /yo byad dag gis
rim gro byed pa'i skyes bu 'ga' zhig byung bar gyur na/ rgyal po chen po/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ ci skyes bu de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur
ram| gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ mang lags so/ /btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa/ skyes bu de ni/ bsod nams kyi phung po
grangs ma mchis/ tshad ma mchis/ dpag tu ma mchis pa bskyed lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ de bas kyang gang da ltar nas ma 'ongs
pa'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma'i bar la chos kyis gnas pa/ yon tan gyis phyug pa dag la de ltar bsngos pa 'phrog pa'i sems can rnams sdig pa'i las de las slar zlog
par byed pa'i rgyal rigs sam ljongs kyi bla de bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gal te
dge slong chos kyis gnas pa gcig cig gi ma bsrungs na/ de bsod nams ma lags pa de snyed cig bskyed par 'gyur lags na/ gang yang gcig gi srung bar
bgyid pa de bsod nams de snyed cig bskyed par 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ gang zag gcig gi len pa ngas ma
gnang ngo / /gnyis las ma yin/ gsum gyi ma yin/ bzhi'i ma yin gyi/ rgyal po chen po/ phyogs bzhi'i dag 'dun gyi phyir gtsug lag khang gcig dang / dgon
pa'i gnas gcig tu ye nyung na'ang dge slong chos kyis gnas pa lnga'i len par gnas gnang ste/ gaN+Di brdungs nas phyogs bzhi'i dge slong glo bur du lhags pa dag lhan cig tu
longs spyod pa dang / nye bar spyod pa dang / gnas khang dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dag longs spyod par ngas gnang
ngo| |gal te gtsug lhag khang gcig dang / dgon pa'i gnas gcig tu dge slong brgya stong gi bar gnas par byed na/ der yang gaN+Di brdungs nas phyogs bzhi'i dge slong glo bur du lhags
pa dag dang lhan cig tu sman gyi yo byad kyi bar dag la longs spyod par ngas gnang ngo / /ma chags pa dag dang / ma bcings pa dag dang / ma chums pa dag dang / nam gyi cha stod dang /
nam gyi cha smad dag la mi nyal ba'i sbyor ba la rjes su brtson pa dag dang / 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dag dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la nang du phyogs pa dag dang / gzhan
la mi smod pa dag dang / bdag la mi bstod pa dag dang / chog shes pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan spyod pa dang / rab tu dben pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa dag dang / mnyam
par bzhag pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dag gis longs spyod par ngas gnang ngo / /rgyal po chen po/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi nang na sems can de lta bu dag gnas te/ rgyal
po chen po/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi nang na sems can de lta bu dag la sems can rnams kyis longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa yongs su btang bas
bsod nams tshad med pa skyed do/ /rgyal po chen po/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnas gang na dge slong lnga'am/ lhag par gnas kyang rung ste/ tshul khrims dang
ldan pa dag dang / tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang / kha na ma tho ba phra mo dag la'ang 'jigs par lta ba dag gnas par byed cing / de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs
pa stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i mdo sde de dag kyang ston par byed/ kha ton du byed la/ gzhan la mi smod cing bdag la mi bstod pa/ phrag dog dang ser sna rnam par spangs pa /
sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba/ thar pa la mngon par brtson pa dag gnas la/ gaN+Di brdungs nas longs spyod par byed na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun de lta bu las
sems can rnams bsod nams tshad med pa de lta bu 'dzin pa dag tu byed do/ /rgyal po chen po/ ye nyung ste dge slong gi dge 'dun lnga'i tshogs shig yod du zin kyang gal
te yang tshul khrims yongs su dag cing ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa phun sum tshogs pa/ 'jig rten pha rol gyi kha na ma tho ba la 'jigs par lta zhing sbyangs pa'i
yon tan dang 'phags pa'i rigs la mngon par brtson pa yin na/ rgyal po chen po/ de ni/ dge slong gi dge 'dun rgya mtsho dang 'dra bar gsungs shing / de ni/ mi dpag tu med pa dag la
phan pa byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad las rab tu rnam par thar par byed pa yin par gsungs na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun bcu'i tshogs
dang zhes bya ba nas brgya stong gi tshogs zhes bya ba'i bar dag lta smos kyang ci dgos/ rgyal po chen po/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gang la bram ze dang khyim bdag chen po dad pa can dag
rim gro bya ba'i phyir gaN+Di rdung ba dag tu byed cing / der yang gal te dge sbyong ltar bcos pa sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong nyung mang rung / mang yang rung ba dag kyang 'du la/ der gal te dge
slong chos kyis gnas pa/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa/ ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa phun sum tshogs pa dge slong lnga'ang 'du na/ rgyal po chen po/ dge slong gi dge 'dun de ni/
chos tshad med pa dang ldan pa yin zhing sbyin gnas chen po dang / lha dang mi thams cad kyis mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po/ de lta bas na/ dge slong chos kyis gnas
pa dag dang / chos kyi kun dga' la dga' ba dag khyed kyi lag tu ngas yongs su gtad do/ /khyim na gnas pa dang / rab tu byung ba la las de dag la rkyen gang yang rung ba dag gis gtses
sam| gnod par byas na mi rung gi /khyed kyis srungs shig /'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo/ bam po
gnyis pa/ rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ci dge slong sdig pa spyod pa tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams kyis dge 'dun
gyi nang du longs spyod par bgyi lags sam/ chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dam pa dag kyang longs spyod dang / nye bar
spyod par bgyi lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ gang khyed kyi blon po chen po dang / sna chen po la gtogs pa dang / rgyal pos bkrabs pa dang /
nyung rum dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag gzhung lugs las 'gal ba nyes pa dang bcas pa zhig yod na/ gang na rgyal po chen po'i dga' ston nam/ dus ston
nye bar gnas par gyur pa'i 'khor gyi nang der nyes pa dang bcas pa'i skyes bu de 'jug pa dang / longs spyod pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtse ba nyams su myong bar bya ba dang / bde ba dang /
yid bde ba mang zhing gnas par nus sam/ rgyal pos gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ de bzhin
du gang tshul khrims 'chal ba/ sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa/ shing rul ba lta bur gyur pa/ dge sbyong ma yin par dge sbyong du khas 'che ba/ tshangs par spyod pa ma yin par tshangs par
spyod par khas 'che ba'i gang zag de lta bu ni/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la gnod pa yin te/ de ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos ma
yin zhing bdud kyi stobs kyi rigs kyis zin pa yin no/ /gang zag de ni/ lam nyam nga ba la gnas pa yin te/ de ni/ phyis kyang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi nang du bgrang ba ma yin
no| |de bzhin du der 'jug par bya ba ma yin te/ dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams la bsngos na tha na til gyi phub ma tsam yang longs spyod par 'os pa ma yin na/ dge 'dun
gyi nang du nye bar longs spyod par bya ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de ni/ chos 'dul ba 'dis bor ba yin no/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa
bcom ldan 'das/ spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi mtshan ma gang dag gis dge slong tshul khrims 'chal ba/ sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa/ dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams kyi
nang du slan chad gnas pa dang / longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod par bgyid par mi 'os par 'tshal lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ rnam pa
'di lta bus tshul khrims 'chal ba'i mgo 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes gang gis kyang myur du rnam par shes par mi nus te/ rgyal po chen po/
'di ni| nang gi dang por sangs rgyas la ma gus pa yin no/ /chos dang / dge 'dun dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma'i gnas lta bu rnams la ma gus
pa yin| 'phags pa'i rigs btang ba yin/ rnal 'byor yid la byed pa la kun dga' ba ma yin/ ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa rnam par spangs pa yin /
khyim na gnas pa dang 'dris pa yin/ tshig kyal pa smra ba yin/ bdag la bstod pa yin/ gzhan la smod pa yin/ de lta bu dag la kun dga' ba yin/ sdig pa'i snyi la
chags pa yin/ lam ngan par zhugs pa yin/ khengs pa yin/ kha drag pa yin/ 'phral g.yar can yin/ 'phyar po yin/ kha shing can yin/ g.yo sgyu can yin/
sgyu byed pa yin/ dge sbyong yon po yin/ dge sbyong g.yo can yin/ dge slong snye long lta bu yin/ dge slong gi dge 'dun mi mthun par 'dod par smra ba yin /
rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa la mngon par dga' ba yin/ 'du 'dzi'i kun dga' la dga' ba yin te/ sdig pa can gyi dge slong tshul khrims
'chal pa de ni/ ji srid du de'i tshul khrims 'chal pa'i mgo byung bar ma gyur gyi bar du gang gis kyang mtshan ma de dag gis myur du shes par mi nus so/ /sdig pa can gyi

dge slong de gang gi tshe khyim gyi gzhi dang / zhing gi gzhi dang / kun dga' ra ba'i gzhi dang / bran dang / bran mo dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / rnga mong dang / bong bu dang / lug dag gang zag gir srel
bar byed na/ de ni/ de'i tshul khrims 'chal ba'i mgo byung ba yin te/ tshul khrims 'chal pa'i mgo des ni/ sdig pa can gyi dge slong de dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi nang nas dor ba yin/
gnas par bya ba ma yin/ longs spyod par bya ba ma yin/ dge slong gi dngos po las lhung ba yin/ pham par gyur pa yin te/ dge slong gi tshul las kyang phyis bslad du med par 'gyur ba
yin no| |rgyal po chen po/ mi gdol ba gnas na gnas par byed pa ni/ bla'i/ dge slong gdol ba yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa/ rgyud tshig pa/ don la mi lta ba/ 'jig rten pha rol
btang ba/ snying rje'i bsam pa med pa/ phyis khung chen po dang 'dra ba/ bdud kyi lam du zhugs pa/ lha dang mi rnams la gnod pa byed pa/ dus gsum thams cad kyi drang srong thub pa rnams
la slu bar byed pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung chos kyi mar me med par byed pa/ chos kyi rgya mtsho skem par byed pa/ chos smra ba'i dbyen byed pa/ sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag rnams la 'drid
par byed pa/ dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams la mtho 'tsham par byed ba/ dge 'dun mthun bar byed pa'i rgyun gcod par byed pa ni/ de lta ma yin no/ /sdig pa can
gyi dge slong de ni/ yongs su 'dzin pa'i rkyen gyis mtho ris kyi lam las rgyal po ldog par byed pa yin no/ /rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang /
skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo ldog par byed pa yin no/ /ngan song gi lam gsum la rab tu gzhog par byed pa yin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ sdig pa can gyi dge slong
de yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis lha dang mi ji snyed cig mi skyid par byed par 'gyur pa la ltos/ rgyal po chen po/ de lta bas na/ yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i dge
slong dang / dge slong chos kyis gnas pa/ yon tan gyis phyug pa dag dang lhan cig tu kun dga' ra ba gcig dang / gtsug lag khang gcig tu gnas par mi bya'o/ /gal te
sdig pa can gyi dge slong de kha drag cing ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa rnam par spangs te dge slong de dag dang lhan cig gnas par byed na/ de'i phyir dge slong chos kyis
gnas pa de dag gis byams pa dang ldan zhing chos dang mthun pas dran par bya ste/ gal te sdig pa can gyi dge slong de gnas de nas 'gro ba lta na/ de ltar ni/ legs/ gal te
'gro bar mi byed na/ der dge slong chos kyis gnas pa de dag dong la grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / grong dang / ljongs dang / ri 'or de dag na rgyal rigs sam/ bram ze'am/ rje'u rigs
sam| dmang rigs gang dbang byed du 'jug pa de la sbran par bya'o/ /gal te rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs des sdig pa can gyi dge slong
yongs su 'dzin dang bcas pa gnas de nas zlog par byed na/ der ni/ dge slong chos kyis gnas pa de dag gis gnas par bya'o/ /ci ste rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang /
rje'u rigs dang / dmang rigs de bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / rnyed pa'i rgyus sdig pa can gyi dge slong yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs byed pa lta na/ de'i phyir dge slong
chos kyis gnas pa de dag gis khro ba bstan par mi bya'o/ /chags pa ma yin/ nga rgyal ma yin te/ 'on kyang cang mi smra bar gnas de nas 'gro bar bya zhing dgon pa'i gnas sam/
nags khrod dam/ ri'am/ ri po'i 'or gzhan gang na sgra gcom chung ba dang / nang du yang dag 'jog dang 'tsham pa'am/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang mthun pa der gnas
par bya'o/ /yang rgyal po gzugs can snying pos mchi ma phyung nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gang bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / rnyed pa'i
slad du sdig pa can gyi dge slong yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs bgyid cing / dge slong chos kyis gnas pa/ yon tan gyis phyug po
rnams kyang gnas nas mchi bar 'gyur pa'i rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs ni/ nyams pa lags so/ /btsun pa bde bar
gshegs pa/ mchog tu nyams pa lags so/ /de'i mi nyid rnyed pa ni/ rnyed par dka' ba lags te/ 'khor ba na 'khor bar bgyid pa de'i mi nyid rnyed pa'i tha ma ni/
de lags so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa grangs ma mchis/ dpag tu ma mchis pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'jig rten du 'byung bar
'gyur bas kyang gang dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams kyi tshig gus par mi nyan pa'i sems can de ni/ ngan song rnams las yongs su thar bar bgyi ba 'am /
mtho ris su gzhag par mi spyod de/ de ni/ sdig pa'i las de lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/
ma 'ongs pa'i dus na la lar gang dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams la shin tu dag pa'i rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dag
'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gi don du dgon pa'i gnas dag byed par 'gyur ro/ /gtsug lag khang dang / dgon pa'i gnas der yang khyim gyi gzhi nas zhing gi gzhi dang / bran
dang / bran mo dang / kun dga' ra ba'i bar de dag gi longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa'i phyir yongs su gtong ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang rgyal
rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba'i bar du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing
yongs su dag pa dag tu'ang skye bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang yang phrad par 'gyur ba nas ring por mi thogs par sbyin pa po dang / spyin bdag de
dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du 'gyur te/ de dag ni/ nga'i bstan pa la dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams
yang dag par 'dzin par byed par 'gyur ba yin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ 'di lta ste/ gang khyod kyi bu'am/ spun nam/ bkrabs pa'am/ sna chen po la gtogs pa gang yang
rung ba zhig nyes pa dang bcas pa yin na/ gang dang gang du rgyal po chen po'i dus ston nam/ dga' ston byung ba der rgyal po chen pos dga' ba dang bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs nyam
su myong bar byed na/ rgyal po chen po/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de khyod kyi mdun du 'dug cing skyed pa dang rtse ba myong bar byed pa'am/ dga' ba dang bde ba
rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gnas par byed nus sam/ rgyal pos gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags te/ skyes bu des bdag gi mdun na mchis par yang rngo mi thogs
lags na/ skyid pa dang rtse ba myong bar bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ de bzhin du gang zag gang zhig gang zag gir bran dang bran
mo srel bar byed cing khyim gyi gzhi nas zhing gi gzhi dang / lug dag gi bar srel bar byed na/ nga'ang de'i ston pa ma yin la/ de'ang nga'i nyan thos ma yin no/ /dus gsum du gshegs
pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la'ang gnod par byed pa dang bcas pa yin no/ /de ni/ chos kyi gnas pa rnams kyi gnas de ltar bsngos pa dag tu chos dang
mthun pas gnas par 'os pa ma yin no/ /rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs gang yang sdig pa can gyi dge slong yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa de'i
don byed pa dang / de nas 'gror mi ster ba'i rgyal rigs nas dmangs rigs kyi bar de ni/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la'ang gnod pa
byed pa dang bcas pa chen po yin no/ /sbyin pa mang po sbyin par byed du zin kyang 'on kyang de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams kyi nang du skye bar
'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po/ de lta bas na/ bdag la phan par yang dag par rjes su lta bas sdig pa can gyi dge slong yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs su gnas par
mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni/ lha dang mi thams cad la'ang gnod pa dang / phan pa ma yin pa dang / log par ltung bar bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang / dkon mchog gsum
gyi gdung med par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rgyal po chen po/ rgyal rigs sam/ bram ze'am/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs gang zhig dge slong
chos kyis gnas pa rnams kyi chos kyi phyogs la yang dag par gnas par byed cing sdig pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyi phyogs la ma yin na/ de sbyin pa mi sbyin du zin kyang
'on kyang de ni/ chos kyi phyogs kyi rgyu'i phyir dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi sbyin bdag dam pa yin no/ /de ni/ dam pa'i chos rjes su srung
ba'i phyir dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dam pa yin par blta bar bya'o/ /'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba nas ring po mi thogs par bla na med
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po/ de lta bas na/ rgyal rigs
'tsham pa khyod kyi lag tu chos kyis gnas pa dang / bstan pa ngas yongs su gtad kyi/ lnga brgya pa tha ma la gnas pa'i bar du khyed kyis nga'i chos kyis
gnas pa yang dag par zungs shig dang / de'i rkyen gyis nga'i chos kyi tshul 'di dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yun ring du gnas par 'gyur
zhing lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ zhal ta ba zhes bgyi lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji tsam gyis na/ zhal ta bar gdags pas gdags
par mdzad pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ dge slong gnyis zhal ta bar ngas gnang ngo / /gnyis gang
yin zhe na/ gang yang rnam par thar pa brgyad la sgom pa'i dgra bcom pa dang / gang yang dge slong slob pa rgyun du zhugs pa yin te/ rgyal po
chen po| dge slong 'di gnyis zhal ta ba'i las byed par ngas gnang ngo / /'dus pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo las/ le'u bcu gcig pa ste nyi
ma'i snying po'i le'u las dam pa'i chos srung ba'i 'dus pa dang po rdzogs so// //gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po gzugs can snying
po dang thabs cig tu dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams kun tu srung pa'i gtam yang yang dag par rtsom pa mdzad pa de'i tshe de'i dus na shar phyogs
su sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa de ni 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su gdung ba med pa zhes bya ba yod do/ /de na de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsam+pa ka'i mdog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /sangs
rgyas kyi zhing de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tsam+pa ka'i mdog de'i 'khor du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying po
zhes bya ba chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying pos gyen du rnam par bltas pa dang /
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying pos steng gi nam mkha' la byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa shar phyogs nas chas shing nub phyogs su 'dong ba dag mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas gang du byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'dong ba nub phyogs su bltas nas kyang de nas snang ba chen po mthong nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas tsam+pa ka'i mdog
ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba rab tu btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ steng gi nam mkha' la byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs ma mchis/ dpag tu ma mchis pa shar phyogs nas chas shing nub phyogs su mchi ba dag bdag gis mthong lags
so| |nub phyogs su snang ba chen po'ang bdag gis mthong lags na/ 'di la rgyu gang lags/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tsam+pa ka'i mdog gis byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing
tshad med pa gang+gA'i klung gi be ma snyed 'das nas snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par gnas pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ chos kyi tshul dang dkon mchog gsum gyi
gdung yun ring du gnas par mdzad pa'i phyir dang / chos kyi gnas pa nyid rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir 'dus pa chen po la theg pa gsum rnam par gtan
la dbab pa bstan pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs rab tu ston par mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der bdud kyi yul rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir
dang / stobs dang mi ldan par mdzad pa'i phyir dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgred par mdzad pa'i phyir dang / chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par mdzad
pa'i phyir 'du ba mdzad de/ der yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rin po che'i tog ces bya ba'i gzungs sngags bshad cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang
longs spyad par mdzad nas slar gshegs so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /
nyan thos chen po rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po yang dag par 'dus par mdzad de/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i spyan
gsum dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa dag bstan kyang da dung 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed kyi sa dang nam mkha' ma 'dres par gang ba zhig de bzhin
gshegs pa chos dam pa gsung ba shAkya thub pa'i chos bstan pa la ngoms pa med do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu snyan par gsung ba
shAkya thub pa bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang / nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa nyid dang / bdud kyi yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi
le'u dang / sems can gyi las zad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags bshad par bzhed nas de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
kyi zhing thams cad na pha rol tu phyin pa drug la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bskal pa brgyas nges par byung ba nas sangs rgyas
kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i phyir mi ldog pa sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa'i bar 'khod pa de dag thams cad
sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir zhugs par gyur cing / 'dir 'khod nas rang rang gi dge ba'i phyogs dang bsam gtan dag gis rnam par spyod
par gyur la/ des na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sa chen po shin tu skal ba dang ldan pa dang / bcud dang ldan pa dang / yon tan dang ldan
pa dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / gtong ba dang ldan par sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan bzhin gyur cig snyam
du dgongs so/ /de lta bas na/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang su dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der zhugs pa de dag
der 'khod nas rang rang gi ji ltar 'tsham pa'i dge ba'i phyogs kyis bsam gtan dag byed de sgom pa de dag las kha cig gis lus las ni/ 'od
'di lta bu byung ste/ dper na/ 'bru mar gyi mar me bzhin no/ /kha cig gi lus las ni/ 'od 'di lta bu'i bar dag byung ste/ dper na/ zla ba dang nyi ma
bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po'i 'od bzhin no/ /der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mang du 'dus pa da ltar snang ba chen pos sangs rgyas kyi
zhing mi mjed khyab par gyur to/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po gang dag lhags par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang sngon der ma phyin pa sha stag de'i
tshe ting nge 'dzin las langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der chas te/ der dong nas kyang skyil mo krung gis 'khod cing rang rang gi bsam
gtan rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis rtse bar byed do/ /der yang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la de dag phyag 'tshal bar byed do/ /bsnyen
bkur byed do/ /'dus pa chen po de la'ang lta bar byed do/ /der de dag nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa dang / klu rnam par 'jig par
mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u dang / sems can rnams kyi las zad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags nyan par yang byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/
khyod kyang da ltar ting nge 'dzin las langs pas rigs kyi bu/ khyod da mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro bar bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/
sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed de na ni/ sems can rnams shin tu sred pa'i kun tu sbyor ba dang ldan zhing srid pa'i ltung la btags pa dag yin
te| sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nang na'ang bud med gzugs mi sdug pa dang / tshul du mi shes pa dang / mchog tu gzugs kyi rgyags pas
dregs pa dang / dri nga ba dang / mi gtsang ba dang / gtsang sbrar spyod pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa dang / ngo gnyis byed pa dang / bden pa ma yin
pa'i tshig smra ba dang / tshangs par spyod par nga rgyal byed pa dang / blun pa dang / mkhas par nga rgyal can dang / ser sna can dang / gtong bar
nga rgyal can dang / ma dad pa dang / dad par nga rgyal can dang / g.yo sgyu can dang / sgyu byed pa dang / drang po'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal can dang /
phrag dog can dang / phrag dog med pa'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal can dang / gnod sems dang ldan pa'i sems dang / byams par nga rgyal can dang / rnam
par dbyen byed pa dang / mthun par nga rgyal can dang / log par lta ba dang / yang dag par lta ba'i nga rgyal can yin te/ skyes bu dam pa mkhas pa
chen po rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba dag bsam gtan yongs su sbyang ba byas su zin kyang yud tsam
gyis bud med kyi dbang du 'gyur ba yin no/ /bud med kyi nyes pas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las yongs su nyams pa dag dang / ngan song ba
dag dang / sems can dmyal ba pa dag tu 'gyur ba yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la nga'i bkas zhu ba'i
phyir nga'i bkas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro bar spro na/ der nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad
pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las zad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags la nga dad pa sbyin par mdzad do/ /der bden pa dang rjes su
mthun pa'i gzungs sngags mthu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags
thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/ gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/ nga rgyal dang / lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang /
nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/ tshol ba thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/ brnab sems thams cad dang / rgod pa
thams cad dang / ma rig pa thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba thams cad dang / mthar 'dzin pa'i lta ba thams cad dang /
the tshom thams cad dang / tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/ rtag par lta ba thams cad dang / chad par
lta ba thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/ sems can du lta ba thams cad dang / sgrib par lta ba thams cad dang / gso bar lta ba thams cad dang / gang zag
tu lta ba thams cad dang / byed pa por lta ba thams cad dang / tshor ba por lta ba thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/ gzugs su lta ba thams cad dang /
sgrar lta ba thams cad dang / drir lta ba thams cad dang / ror lta ba thams cad dang / reg byar lta ba thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/ rmad du byung ba
chen por lta ba thams cad dang / skye bar lta ba thams cad dang / gnas par lta ba thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa 'di dang / bden pa dang rjes su mthun
pa'i bzod pa/ gzugs kyi phung po thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par byed pa nas rnam par shes
pa'i phung po thams cad kyi bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par byed pa/ mig gi dbang po thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
yongs su shes par byed pa nas yid kyi dbang po thams cad kyi bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par byed pa/ phung po dang / khams
dang / skye mched thams cad kyi bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par byed pa/ spong bar byed pa/ chos thams cad 'dod chags dang
bral bar byed pa/ byang grol gyi bde ba thams cad ston par byed pa 'di bskur bar mdzad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dang de na sems can rnams 'byung
po dmus long 'dra ba dag dang / mchog tu glen pa dag dang / 'byung po lug dang 'dra ba dag dang / 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis myos pa dag
yod de| bden pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa 'di ni/ sems can de dag gi lta ba thams cad spong ba dang / longs spyod mi zad pa nyid byed
pa yin/ bden pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa 'di ni/ chos thams cad kyi gter brtan pa yin/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos la bdud dang
phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod par byed pa/ bdud thams cad kyi yul rnam par 'jig par byed pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang
bden pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa 'di ni/ bdud rnams tshar gcod par byed pa yin/ klu rnams pham par byed pa yin/ lha rnams
dga' bar byed pa yin/ gnod sbyin rnams snying dga' bar byed pa yin/ lha ma yin rnams 'bros par byed pa yin/ nam mkha' lding rnams
dngang par byed pa yin/ mi'am ci rnams dad par byed pa yin/ lto 'phye chen po rnams skrag par byed pa yin/ phas kyi rgol ba rnams 'dul
bar byed pa yin/ rgyal rigs rnams mngon par dad par byed pa yin/ bram ze rnams 'jug par byed pa yin/ rje'u rigs rnams dga' bar
byed pa yin/ dmangs rigs rnams rab tu dga' bar byed pa yin/ bud med 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa yin/ mang du thos pa rnams skyo
bar byed pa yin/ rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams mngon par dga' bar byed pa yin/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa
yin| 'thab mo dang / mu ge dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / dus ma yin
pa'i char dang / shwa dang / dus ma yin pa'i lhags pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i tsha ba dang / dngos po kha ba dang / tsha ba dang / rtsub po dang /
hrud hrud po dang / reg par dka' ba rnams rnam par zhi bar byed pa/ sprug par byed pa/ mdangs sum 'gyur du rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/
dam pa'i chos kyi tshul gsal bar byed pa yin/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcod par byed pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rton
par byed pa yin/ 'khor bas skrag pa rnams dbugs 'byin par byed pa yin pa nas zad pa shes pa'i bar skyed par byed pa yin/ mi skye ba shes
pa rtogs par byed pa yin/ ma rig pa'i mun pa'i phung po thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa yin/ sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar byed pa yin
no| |s+yAd ya the da na/ ba ye ba ya pa ri bA re/ bA he bA ha pa ri bA re/ pr-i tha be/ pr-i tha bA pa ri bA re/ A be a ba pa ri bA re/ te dze te dza pa ri bA re/
mA le mA la pa ri bA re/ kha ge kha ga pa ri bA re/ A lo ke A lo ka pa ri bA re/ s+thA me s+thA ma pa ri bA re/ ri dze ri dza pa ri bA re/ si li si la pa ri bA re/ ga
me ga ma pa ri bA re/ A bo pa a bo pa pa ri bA re/ mA la ma la ma/ la ma la ma/ rA la rA la ma/ bI dz+nyA na b+hu ta gra he/ b+hu ta gra hA pa ri bA re/ tsak+Shu gra
